With humankind's future at stake, a group of scientists and a powerful telepath venture into the void aboard a spaceship full of secrets.
Despite her vain stepmother and mean stepsisters, an aspiring singer works as an elf at a Christmas tree lot and finds her own holiday miracle.
When two sisters travel from Canada to Punjab to visit their maternal family, they discover an opportunity to mend a broken bond with their grandmother.
A small-town dreamer is sure he's landed on a gold mine after accidentally filming a murder but is sucked into a violent tale of greed and deception.
A socially awkward teen bonds with a group of misfits who plot to abduct the school's arrogant rich kid – until their kidnapping scheme turns deadly.
Cal turns to his friends for help through a hilariously dark time when he discovers that his partner Thom's been cheating on him.
From romantic pursuits to their friendship, a trio of young men navigate the complexities of relationships while sharing a London apartment.
This documentary examines the influence of Hong Kong's martial arts cinema on filmmaking from the Shaw Brothers to modern-day Hollywood blockbusters.
An Indian man in Canada marries a local citizen to legalize his immigration status. The only problem? His girlfriend isn't thrilled about his new wife.
Guilt-ridden over his involvement in a fatal car accident, a young ex-pat returns to Punjab, falling for a woman who carries traumas of her own.
A Punjabi man attempts to build a life in London in hopes of impressing his girlfriend’s mother, who insists her daughter marry a man outside of India.
A young villager moves to Chandigarh and falls for his bubbly neighbor, but their love story is affected by several heartbreaking twists of fate.
A broken spaceship strands four very tiny aliens on Earth, where they discover an adventure (and strange dangers!) that they never expected.
This biopic follows pro golfer Ariya Jutanugarn's journey to the LPGA tour, from child prodigy to her number-one ranking in the world.
A get-rich-quick scheme goes awry when a group of friends stumbles onto a dangerous conspiracy and wind up getting mistaken for the bad guys.
Navigating creative pressures and personal upsets, French rapper Nekfeu sets out on a global quest for musical inspiration in this documentary.
A young prosecutor is assigned a career-making case involving a colleague but soon starts to question the motivations behind the charges.
Brought together by meaningful meals in the past and present, a doctor and a chef are reacquainted when they begin working at a hospice ward.

norm_title: guatemala heart of the mayan world
description: From Sierra de las Minas to Esquipulas, explore Guatemala's cultural and geological wealth, including ancient Mayan cities and other natural wonders.
A goofy copywriter unwittingly convinces the Indian cricket team that she’s their lucky mascot, to the dismay of their superstition-shunning captain.
Arranged to marry a rich man, young Ada is crushed when her true love goes missing at sea during a migration attempt – until a miracle reunites them.
Nollywood star Ramsey Nouah learns that someone is impersonating him and breaks out of a mental institution to expose the imposter.
Romance, mystery and adventure intertwine as a young man falls in love and a severed hand scours Paris for its owner in this mesmerizing animated film.

norm_title: kalushi the story of solomon mahlangu
description: The life and times of iconic South African liberation fighter Solomon Mahlangu, who battled the forces of apartheid, come into focus.
Two mooching friends vie for the attention of wealthy, beautiful women only to discover that their lavish lifestyles are bogus.
After an expensive night out, two flatmates get tangled in an overnight misadventure to recover their rent money to pay their dead landlord's daughter.
Nursing a broken heart, an IT specialist moves to London to audition for a reality TV show that unexpectedly turns into a real-life cartel drama.
A quirky fashion student becomes the nanny of a handsome widower’s three kids, experiencing a series of silly antics and schemes.
When a colonel uncovers controversial intel about the government, he makes a shocking discovery and must decide whether to reveal it or risk his life.
A widowed radio DJ and his four spoiled kids need to tighten their belts and pull together when their life of luxury turns lean just before Christmas.
Four comedians from Brazil riff on sexuality, politics, religion and motherhood – and set out to prove a woman's place is anywhere she wants it to be.
A struggling LA musician tries to win over his new girlfriend's gruff dad and quirky, tight-knit siblings on a 10-day Christmas visit to Philadelphia.
Burned out and taken for granted, a working mom suspects her partner is cheating, so to win back his attentions, she feigns a medical diagnosis.
In this action-packed drama based on an extraordinary true story, four brothers protect more than 1,000 Jewish refugees during World War II.
When caste differences throw a wrench into their otherwise blossoming relationship, a couple must somehow convince the girl’s father to let them marry.
In a journey back in time to the ancient city of Mirchigadh, Little Singham vies for the title of Ultimate Warrior and fights a zombie king’s army.

norm_title: body remembers when the world broke open
description: After a traumatic event, two Indigenous women in Vancouver are brought together and form a deep bond despite leading different lives.
Hit man Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family in this acclaimed film from Martin Scorsese.
The peaceful lives of the residents inhabiting a breathtaking seaside town are shaken following a series of macabre crimes.
Aspiring to fulfill his father’s dream and become a civil services officer, a young man loses his way upon becoming entangled with a criminal lynchpin.

norm_title: what the f is going on
description: Featuring extensive interviews, this documentary takes a critical look at the gender inequality in Spain as the feminist movement aims to shift reality.
Trying to go straight, a once-successful businessman fresh out of prison is forced to orchestrate a brazen crime or risk his family.

norm_title: once upon a time in lingjian mountain
description: As the nine continents face a crisis, a young disciple joins the Spirit Blade sect and comes under the tutelage of a temperamental sage.
Thrust from a violent home into a brutal custody center, a teenager learns to navigate a tough new reality and forge unlikely alliances to survive.
Eight stories celebrating family, faith, love and forgiveness come to life in this series inspired by Dolly Parton's iconic country music catalog.
The girls of Ōarai High must face off against a formidable university team in a fierce tank battle to once again avoid closure of their school.
Ride along as police officers and drug smugglers go toe-to-toe, trying to outwit each other in locales around the world.
A new guardian "angelus" uncovers a secret behind the Angelus System's bureaucracy that leads him to break its official rules about protecting humans.
Featuring interviews and vintage footage, this documentary traces American icon Carroll Shelby's life of reinvention from farmer to racer to entrepreneur.
An extraordinary discovery inspires two human princes and an elven assassin to team up on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.
As Queen Poppy welcomes a new time of peace in Troll Village with parties, sports and holiday celebrations, Branch tries to be more fun-loving.
Medieval magic sends a 14th-century knight to modern-day Ohio, where he falls for a high school science teacher who's disillusioned by love.
Living under the same roof, a group of unabashed friends wrestle with everyday issues from financial woes and shared quarters to romantic misfires.
This documentary charts the rise and fall of hot yoga founder Bikram Choudhury as his global empire is born and disturbing revelations come to light.
A village landlord's daughter and an educated commoner must decide if their budding forbidden love is worth resisting a repressive social hierarchy.
A Christmas reunion becomes a gateway to the past in this three-part series that explores the intimate complexities of one family's history.
Lorena Ramírez of Mexico's Rarámuri community lives a pastoral life – except when she straps on her sandals to compete as an ultramarathon runner.
A self-trained engineer risks debt, love and reputation in his quest to improve the grueling work conditions of his mother and her weaving community.
When their 4-year-old son is murdered, a young couple fights a twisting and arduous battle trying to identify a frustratingly elusive killer.
After ditching her domestic life to become a chef, a clueless maid crosses paths with two charming suitors who help her reach her dreams.
When a wardrobe malfunction goes viral, a bubbly live streamer struggles to navigate her classmates' cruel judgment and the small town she lives in.
Decades after a nuclear war, survivors on the moon revisit Earth to locate a potential power source – and find shape-shifting reptiles instead.
At the beginning of the 20th century, circumstances drive a young, idealistic suffragette to find radical approaches to fighting male oppression.
Determined to save an Amazon tribe being squeezed by logging, a group of students finds nothing but trouble when their plane crashes in the jungle.
Encountering each other after a long separation, two childhood friends from orphanage must overcome great odds to fulfill an old promise and find love.
In 1980s Tokyo, an enigmatic expat is suspected of killing her friend, who's gone missing in the wake of their love triangle with a local photographer.
In the most remote areas of the Amazon jungle, a writer and his anthropologist friend meet communities who have resisted change for centuries.
A pampered but kind-hearted average joe ditches his romancing and peacekeeping ways when he’s framed for a murder he didn’t commit.
A world-weary man’s self-imposed home confinement becomes a comedy of errors with the simultaneous arrivals of a peculiar package and a curious journalist.
After a chance encounter in LA, two teens from different social backgrounds reunite at an exclusive high school attended by Korea’s über rich.
A selfish postman and a reclusive toymaker form an unlikely friendship, delivering joy to a cold, dark town that desperately needs it.

norm_title: la robe de mariee des cieux
description: After a chance encounter that ends on bad terms, two clashing strangers soon cross paths again as their fates become inevitably intertwined.
An unfortunate accident alters the life of a high school basketball prodigy, who abandons his beloved sport and becomes entangled in a love triangle.
A refined young Joseon scholar's life turns upside down after he rescues a drunk princess who later accuses him of taking something precious from her.
A trio of filmmakers treks across India to explore the correlation between vanishing rivers, massive energy projects and renewable energy sources.
When a lonely teenager skips his morning classes to sit in a lovely garden, he meets a mysterious older woman who shares his feelings of alienation.
Trapped on an island destroyed by a tsunami, the students of an elite school try to hold on to hope. But mysterious forces seem to work against them.
The minds behind history's most iconic toy franchises discuss the rise – and sometimes fall – of their billion-dollar creations.
After a fateful domestic clash, a devoted mother finds herself in prison and fighting to survive in hopes of reuniting with her daughter.
Spirited high school misfits with hearts of gold begin their journeys into adulthood as they navigate school, friendship, romance and heartbreak.
Love leaps off the page when an astronomer magically meets her comic book hero in the flesh, but learns that his fictional problems are very real.
In this docuseries, soccer great Diego Maradona comes to Culiacán, the heart of the Sinaloa Cartel, to save the local team, the Dorados, and maybe himself, too.
As a chief of staff in the National Assembly, Jang Tae-jun influences power behind the scenes while pursuing his own ambitions to rise to the top.
This stream-of-consciousness drama centers on a day in the life of a gay college professor who's reeling from his longtime lover's recent death.

norm_title: put your head on my shoulder
description: On the cusp of graduation, an accounting major searching for her career winds up living with a genius physics student who shakes up her daily routine.
Traumatized by combat, newly returned war veterans find solace in service dogs that guide them back to a fulfilling civilian life.
A cohabiting couple in their 20s navigate the ups and downs of work, modern-day relationships and finding themselves in contemporary Mumbai.

norm_title: greatest events of wwii in colour
description: From the attack on Pearl Harbor to D-Day, the most pivotal events of World War II come to life in this vivid docuseries featuring colorized footage.
On a road trip to save an endangered animal, polar opposites Guy and Sam learn to try new things like friendship – and a certain delectable dish.
A snowstorm hits a small town on a cold Christmas Eve, affecting the friendships, love lives and futures of several high school seniors.
Mehdi gets out of prison, planning to settle old scores. But first, he must reconnect with his gang, now living in an idyllic beach resort in Thailand.
A reporter must hunt for the truth behind a strange murder after she crosses paths with a young cop and becomes the investigation's prime suspect.
A small-town Louisiana minister and one of his parishioners cope with grief, alcoholism and a crisis of faith in this dramatic character study.
Hit hard by the Lehman shock, a well-meaning young man joins a phone scam operation and gets increasingly embroiled in the underworld.
As three kingdoms struggle for control of a walled city, a figure with a rare power spins a web of intrigue that entangles a king's court.
Luccas and Gi are heading to a world famous gymkhana camp. Only problem: so are their bullies... A fun musical that will get you in a vacation mood.
To earn cash, roommates Sam and Cat start a baby-sitting service – and quickly discover just what an adventure baby-sitting can be.
A budding teen psychopath and a rebel hungry for adventure embark on a star-crossed road trip in this darkly comic series based on a graphic novel.
On the verge of divorce, a middle-aged couple, each involved in a serious affair, rethink their marriage and the meaning of love and fidelity.
A student and a reticent teen first meet at a bakery in the 1990s and try to find each other through the years, as fate keeps pulling them apart.
When a beloved secret agent falls deep into a coma, his bumbling brother must defend their community from a divisive political threat.

description: People dedicated to rejecting the American ideal that things bring happiness are interviewed in this documentary showing the virtues of less is more.
Taken into custody, a murder suspect's theatrical explanations of his peculiar modus operandi unearth truths far beyond the crime he’s accused of.

In this live-action adventure, the gang heads to Hawaii, where Timmy learns the source of all fairy magic is in dangerous hands.
The life of cheerleader Bella Dawson turns upside down when, in a twist of fate, she becomes quarterback for her middle school's football team.
Big Time Rush heads to London for their first world tour, but when the boys' bags are switched, they get mixed up in a mission to save the world.
When Arnold and his crew win a trip to San Lorenzo, their adventure in the wild forces them to take the same risky path as Arnold's missing parents.
After a century-old curse of bad luck, a determined teen embarks on a journey to break her family’s generational misfortune.
When a shy teen transfers to a new school, he elects to mix things up by playing along with the rumor that he's a vampire.
When high school girl-geek Jordan becomes a werewolf after moving to Romania, she must elude her own brother, who sets out to slay her.
After the school principal gets pranked, a curious crew of preteen super sleuths tests their detective skills to solve an underwater ruse.
When aspiring singer Tori Vega joins the eccentric students at Hollywood Arts High, she struggles to fit in with the amazingly talented teens.
The residents of an isolated town look to revive their home's identity when a group of foreigners unexpectedly arrive, bringing culture shock with them.
Two astronauts attempt to brave a life in Earth's orbit on a record-setting mission to see if humans have the endurance to survive a flight to Mars.
In a future where regeneration technology lets humans live indefinitely, a cop and a troubled young woman investigate a strange wave of youth suicides.
Time passes and tension mounts in a Florida police station as an estranged interracial couple awaits news of their missing teenage son.
Comedian Billy Eichner sprints through New York with celebrities to stun pedestrians with unapologetic, unfiltered and unique pop culture questions.
Two girls realize they're both visiting grandparents they’ve never met and decide to switch places to see how the other half lives.
With Christmas just around the corner, sisters Miranda and Lyla bring their families to their childhood home, where rivalries don't take a holiday.
A notorious thief allies with a street racer for a grand heist involving an elaborate game of deceit with authorities, who have their own dirty secrets.
In this documentary, survivors recall the catastrophic 2018 Camp Fire, which razed the town of Paradise and became California’s deadliest wildfire.
When her husband abruptly ends their marriage, empty nester Kate embarks on a solo second honeymoon in Africa, finding purpose – and potential romance.
Home for the holidays, a broke puppeteer knows there’s treasure buried somewhere under her town. To find it, all she has to do is die – almost.
High schooler Yuta wants to leave his past as a delusional weirdo behind. But his classmate Rikka has her own delusions, and she's interested in his.
To keep the boys in line, student council president Misaki runs the school with an iron fist – while secretly working as a waitress at a maid café.
Fleeing the family business and an arranged marriage, Santa’s daughter chooses a magical adventure of her own: College.
Wayward Prince Hal must turn from carouser to warrior king as he faces hostilities from inside and outside the castle walls in the battle for England.
A gravity-defying boy raised in seclusion matures into an extraordinary man – and an international celebrity – who longs for human connection.

norm_title: old thieves the legend of artegios
description: While carrying out prison sentences, five notorious thieves in Mexico City share their principles, preferred methods and respect for the craft.
José Olaya, a Spanish miner, emigrates to Argentina in 1934, while his son, an architect, moves to Spain after Argentina's economic collapse in 2001.
A mysterious classmate leads four idealistic teens in a revolt against a rising tide of nationalistic fervor, but their movement takes a dark turn.
This introspective rockumentary follows the career triumphs and intimate moments of legendary Mexican band Zoé as they embark on a global tour.
Two nefarious schemes taking place 10 years apart entangle a dauntless triad member, who must break out of prison to rescue a loved one.
During a holiday stay at a hotel resort, a flight attendant encounters a wealthy, mysterious man with two different personas.

In the early 1990s, the love between a cassette shop owner and a traveling circus performer challenges caste barriers and disapproving parents.
A detective finds himself 30 years in the future and must solve a string of grisly crimes before he can return to the past.
In a talk show straight from the heart, actor and producer Reese Witherspoon visits with groundbreaking women to discuss their inspiring journeys.

norm_title: road to el camino behind the scenes of el camino a breaking bad movie
description: Aaron Paul, Vince Gilligan and other cast members, producers and crew share stories and footage from the making of "El Camino."
This documentary captures the joy and heartbreak of families separated by the U.S.-Mexico border sharing a short but bittersweet reunion in 2018.
In an ancient sport traditionally reserved for men, 20-year-old female sumo prodigy Hiyori attempts to revolutionize Japan’s national pastime.
Six hopeful friends journey into adulthood to create the moments that pull them together, draw them apart and make them fall in love.
A shy college student with a knack for drawing develops a crush on a musically gifted classmate and embarks on a journey of self-discovery.
Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the '90s, 20 years later. He’s a curmudgeon with a heart of...not quite gold...but something like gold. Copper?
An honest lawyer reaches a moral crossroads after the cops force her to inform on her incarcerated brother, the leader of a rising criminal faction.
Secrets bubble to the surface after a sensual encounter and an unforeseen crime entangle two friends and a woman caught between them.

After a mysterious woman saves her daughter from a deadly snakebite, a single mother must repay the debt by killing a stranger before sundown.
Pressured to marry a nice Orthodox Jewish woman, Motti is thrown for a loop when he falls for classmate Laura, who his mother will never approve of.
In a magical world of inter-clan rivalry, two soulmates face treacherous schemes and uncover a dark mystery linked to a tragic event in the past.
Living his best life in post-apocalyptic LA, a slacker strives to find the girl of his dreams while outwitting mindless ghouls and cliquish gangs.
An affectionate documentary looks back at the mid-1960s, when Hollywood’s Laurel Canyon was a creative nexus for young, innovative musicians.

Chef David Chang takes his insatiable curiosity about food, culture and identity on the road, in the convivial company of fun-loving celebrity guests.
From ruffling their majestic feathers to nailing im-peck-able courtship routines, birds in paradise flaunt their best moves in hopes of landing a mate.

norm_title: master z the ip man legacy
description: In this spin-off, a martial arts expert once defeated by Ip Man is forced to abandon his reclusive lifestyle to combat a rising Chinese triad.
Jenny Slate's first stand-up special is a mix of stage time, funny stories about adulthood and conversations with family in her childhood home.
A sketchy arms transaction in a deserted warehouse turns into a free-for-all when the two sides engage in a take-no-prisoners shootout.
Kaal is back – bigger and badder than ever! Can Little Singham fight the battle of a lifetime to stop the demon’s plans to wreak havoc on earth?
For the crew trapped aboard a sunken Russian submarine the deadliest threat is the bureaucracy on land. Based on a true story.
After his girlfriend wins the Miss Nigeria pageant, a young man faces unexpected competition of his own when he joins her on a campaign in South Africa.
With his desperate parents in tow, an 11-year-old boy with a debilitating illness checks into an isolated clinic to undergo experimental therapy.
A teacher turns to a dubious man to raise money for her daughter's life-saving surgery, a crisis that is unexpectedly catapulted to a national stage.
When a group of people meets at the same party, they form four different relationships, each experiencing similar phases of love.
From decorating his home to devouring sweets, join Bheem as he makes merry – and a bit of mischief – while the festival of lights is in full swing.

Doubting her future as a nun, a woman attempts to have a child, triggering a mystic tribal prophecy that could force her to make a godly sacrifice.
In this documentary, Alex trusts his twin, Marcus, to tell him about his past after he loses his memory. But Marcus is hiding a dark family secret.
When a widow gets swindled out of insurance money, her search for answers leads to two cunning lawyers in Panama who hide cash for the superrich.

A pampered heir must complete a year of service work to inherit his dad's assets but unearths new goals when he's placed in an unfamiliar region.
Hoping to do good while making millions, three college graduates create a startup. But as business begins to flourish, their own bond starts to fray.
Now a lecturer in Edinburgh, Fahri tries to begin a new chapter as the love of his life, Aisha, volunteers in the Gaza Strip. Have they moved on?
When a mysterious box arrives at his door, a doctor and father is forced to participate in a twisted killing game, or risk losing everything.
When they learn of a secret plot to track and control kids, identical twins Dru and Kal team up with a band of runaway rebels to take back their world.
A sound director who suddenly starts getting visions of someone else’s future gets mired in the lives of two women, who happen to share the same name.

Fans, experts and creators of the "League of Legends" detail the game’s rise from free demo to global esports titan.
Facing major changes, a mother realizes it's time to live for herself and decides to enroll in college, where she finds her dream as well as new love.
A single mother and her twin sons move into a rural house, unaware of its history of being inhabited by an evil spirit that preys upon young children.
Special Forces trainer James Wilks asks elite athletes to compare the merits of meat, protein and plants for building strength. Spoiler: plants win.
After a cop's fiancée and a jewelry designer's father are found dead together, the two bereaved ones face a perilous aftermath of a theft gone wrong.
Three brothers – a gangster, a scholar and an impressionable teen – learn hard lessons in the gritty suburbs while searching for the means to survive.
A mother's plan to find her bachelor son a match derails when a new prospect turns up and sinister schemes unfold.

norm_title: el camino a breaking bad movie
description: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman attempts to outrun his past. Written and directed by "Breaking Bad" creator Vince Gilligan, starring Aaron Paul.
After his wife and injured daughter disappear from an ER, a man conducts a panicked search and becomes convinced the hospital is hiding something.
A bullied teenager turns to beauty pageants as a way to exact her revenge, with the help of a disgraced coach who soon realizes he's in over his head.
With a matriarch bent on having a lavish 51st birthday party, her family's debt is on the verge of exposure, threatening their business – and legacy.
A con man and a would-be filmmaking crew force themselves into the lives of two grief-scarred young women. But nothing is as it seems.
When Parisian Elsa gets hung up on her ex, her best friends secretly hire a male escort to help her move on. But their plan works a little too well.
Back in her childhood home to help her sister care for their comatose mother, Alicia must face a dark force from her past that now threatens her child.
Wholesome college freshman Tessa Young thinks she knows what she wants out of life, until she crosses paths with complicated bad boy Hardin Scott.

norm_title: home is where the killer is
description: Recovering from cancer, a young woman thinks she’s found a friend when she rents a room from a caring ex-doctor. But empathy soon becomes obsession.

norm_title: spooky tale of captain underpants hackaween
description: When Melvin tries to cancel Halloween, clever best friends Harold and George create their own spooky holiday – and it's a huge success!
Richard accepts a bet that he can't find a companion to a friend's wedding, not knowing the dating app he's using includes a 45-day contract.
At the end of the Goryeo period, there were those who led the charge to proclaim a new age – and the ordinary individuals who risked everything.
When he lands the lead in his Christian school's production of "The Merchant of Venice," a secretly gay student is bullied by wealthy upperclassmen.
When he discovers the world's oceans brimming with plastic waste, a documentary filmmaker investigates the pollution's environmental impacts.
A robbery leaves a proprietor penniless before his wedding, but becoming a son-in-law to a second family might be the financial solution he needs.
A masked figure known as "The Curious" collects tales of dark magic, otherworldly encounters and twisted technology in this kids anthology series.
After hearing a boy's cry for help, a pregnant woman and her brother wade into a vast field of grass, only to discover there may be no way out.
When their fun in the park is threatened by a neighborhood nagger, a group of friends declares war to play freely on their turf.
A widowed mom sets out to solve the mystery surrounding her young son's emerging superpowers while keeping his extraordinary gifts under wraps.
This docuseries travels deep into the heart of the food supply chain to reveal unsavory truths and expose hidden forces that shape what we eat.
Eight undocumented families' fates roller-coast as the United States' immigration policies are transformed.
After the man she thought she'd marry breaks up with her, Ana joins a class for single women who are in search of a husband.
Shunned by his country due to religion, Abdus Salam strives for an achievement that would define modern physics and redefine his place back home.
In this adaptation of a popular webtoon, a poor student trying to navigate college life gains the attention of a wealthy upperclassman with a dark side.
A veterinarian and two writers have a mysterious connection to Korean independence fighters from the Japanese colonial period.
Three best friends look for love, laughs and some lifelong memories while attending college together.
Three engineering students deal with dorm drama, date around, and do whatever it takes to make their dreams come true.
A starry-eyed employee of a hot cosmetics company hires a dreamy photographer who is secretly indebted to a major rival – her sketchy aunt.
Four girls from different backgrounds become unlikely friends when they move into a dormitory for female dental students.
While living under one roof, five close-knit 20-somethings maneuver the highs and lows of friendship, romantic entanglements and finding themselves.
This documentary follows eight women in India who struggle with self-confidence and society's expectations but rediscover themselves through running.
The Rugrats take to the big screen and visit Paris when Mr. Pickles gets summoned to fix a giant robot at the EuroReptarland theme park.
A fugitive soldier gets swept up in personal and political intrigue when he's hired as a bodyguard for the family of a presidential candidate.
A talented singer falls in love at first sight with a music prodigy who has an affinity for lies – and a knack for being a hit-making producer.
When his baby brother Dil is born, Tommy Pickles and his pals decide that he's too much responsibility and try to return him to the hospital.
This insightful drama looks at the crumbling marriage between a self-centered novelist – whose career is waning – and his up-and-coming writer wife.
Long before he was commissioner, rookie cop James Gordon takes on Gotham City crime and corruption to avenge the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents.

norm_title: cultivating the seas history and future of the fullcycle cultured kindai tuna
description: An in-depth look at the full-cycle breeding program for bluefin Kindai tuna pioneered by Kinki University’s Aqua Culture Research Institute.
A clumsy but cheerful fisheries student struggles to find her place at a research institute renowned for its tuna cultivation. The work isn't easy.
Years after a disastrous job in Balochistan, a former Indian spy must confront his past when he returns to lead an unsanctioned hostage-rescue mission.
While chasing her dream of becoming a chef, Zeliha cooks up trouble in the kitchen with her wild, kooky and unsuspecting ways.

norm_title: in the shadow of the moon
description: A Philadelphia detective slowly unravels as he nurses a lifelong obsession with an enigmatic female serial killer whose crimes defy explanation.
In this anime visual album, a mysterious driver heads deep into a postapocalyptic hellscape toward a ferocious showdown with two monstrous opponents.
Class divides become thorns in the budding romance between the crony of a nativist Mumbai politician and the new, North Indian resident of his chawl.
As the Japanese invasion looms, Chinese kung fu master Ip Man's world changes when rival master Gong Er and her father arrive in his village.
Step inside the minds of the most innovative designers in a variety of disciplines and learn how design impacts every aspect of life.
Bird watchers on both sides of the U.S.-Mexico border share their enthusiasm for protecting and preserving some of the world's most beautiful species.
A police officer and a doctor face an emotionally charged mystery when seven local residents inexplicably return from the dead in peak physical form.
A surly septuagenarian gets another chance at her 20s after having her photo snapped at a studio that magically takes 50 years off her life.
A hotshot NYPD negotiator butts heads with the FBI and meets his match in a meticulous criminal mastermind as she attempts to rob the Federal Reserve.
Under pressure to marry, a perennial bachelor hires a much younger woman to act as his fiancée, but her bond with his family throws his plan for a loop.
An American man in the midst of a mid-life crisis travels to the French countryside to find a new lease on life.

norm_title: do paise ki dhoop chaar aane ki baarish
description: When a sex worker hires a gay songwriter to care for her disabled son, the ensuing bonds that form offer a complex portrayal of love and family.
When his nephew dies in a plane crash, stunt man Cha Dal-geon resolves to find out what happened, with the help of covert operative Go Hae-ri.

norm_title: inside bills brain decoding bill gates

Betrayed by his loan shark brother, a hardened convict escapes from prison while on furlough to exact revenge against the people who made him a killer.

norm_title: los tigres del norte at folsom prison

This moving documentary chronicles the unshakeable romance between a couple who met and fell in love while imprisoned in a Nazi concentration camp.
In this documentary series on the tangled history of allegations against musician R. Kelly, women give detailed accounts of sexual and mental abuse.

norm_title: crystal calls making the dark crystal age of resistance
description: Go behind the scenes with stars, puppeteers and creators as they bring Jim Henson's magical world of Thra back to life in a sweeping fantasy series.
In this documentary, Chelsea Handler explores how white privilege impacts American culture – and the ways it’s benefited her own life and career.

norm_title: kabaneri of the iron fortress the battle of unato

Lured back to her hometown, a famous horror writer discovers that the evil spirit who plagues her dreams is now wreaking havoc in the real world.
A young man falls for a heroic general and soon follows her footsteps as humans defend Earth against extraterrestrials seeking a precious energy source.
After years of slouching through life, 6-foot-1 teen Jodi resolves to conquer her insecurities and gets caught up in a high school love triangle.
After a young woman is accused of lying about a rape, two female detectives investigate a spate of eerily similar attacks. Inspired by true events.
Wiped clean of memories and thrown together, a group of strangers fight to survive harsh realities – and the island that traps them.
Ever wonder what's happening inside your head? From dreaming to anxiety disorders, discover how your brain works with this illuminating series.
Haunted by the suicide of a brother, a director and his kin walk across the U.K. in an emotionally trying, visually sublime journey toward healing.

From a schoolboy’s crush to a middle-aged bachelor’s office romance, four love stories spanning age, religion and status unfold in a small Indian town.
In Goa and in desperate need of cash, four childhood friends get another shot at making their long-abandoned dreams of becoming filmmakers come true.
Bogged down with money problems, a couple grows cautious of each other but hit the lottery and decide to stay together – till death do they part.

norm_title: american factory a conversation with the obamas
description: Barack and Michelle Obama talk with directors Steven Bognar and Julia Reichert about the documentary and the importance of storytelling.
Outcast from society and left to die in the wilderness, a young boy with polio embarks on a journey to connect with his mother. Based on a true story.
Rushing to pay off a loan shark, a young man breaks into a bungalow to steal the cash, unprepared for the dog standing guard – or the trouble inside.
In this documentary, the director remembers a sister who left behind her life under Brazil’s dictatorship and moved to New York with dreams of acting.
Experience nature's art as filmmaker Louie Schwartzberg highlights the beauty that lurks in oceans, forests, deserts and flowers.
A pregnancy forces an actress out of her latest play and into a difficult confrontation with her own rapidly transforming reflection.

When an unattractive man gets engaged to a beautiful woman, their families oppose the union and the priest set to perform the ceremony is kidnapped.
When a young soccer fan and his idol forge an unexpected friendship, the connection teaches them both lessons about life and their love of the game.

When a San Francisco exec wins a New Zealand inn, she ditches city life to remodel and flip the rustic property with help from a handsome contractor.

norm_title: travis scott look mom i can fly
description: While crafting his Grammy-nominated album "Astroworld," Travis Scott juggles controversy, fatherhood and career highs in this intimate documentary.

Cast members, writers, producers and mental health professionals discuss some of the difficult issues and themes explored in "13 Reasons Why."

When an internet-obsessed teen develops a rare illness that forces her to move to a remote town, she must navigate her relationships without technology.

Dr. Lisa Sanders crowdsources diagnoses for mysterious and rare medical conditions in a documentary series based on her New York Times Magazine column.

Four friends shake up their lives when they meet a new woman in their apartment complex who encourages them to embrace their wild sides.
Bodybuilder and two-time Mr. Universe, Calum von Moger, reflects on his rise to fame and battle to come back from a debilitating injury.

Fifteen years after the Crusades ended in defeat, a veteran knight becomes master of his order's Paris temple and discovers a shocking secret.

A couple’s caustic, increasingly jarring interactions over a Mumbai evening strain their relationship until it threatens to break at its fraying seams.

When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired – but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.

A steroid peddler explains how he went from an unlicensed anti-aging expert to the point man for the biggest scandal in baseball history.

A family finds their lives turned upside down when a teenage con artist shows up on their doorstep, claiming she's a distant relative.

Feeling guilty after a high-speed chase leaves a girl dead, a determined sergeant pursues the crime boss who triggered the fatal car accident.

An unconventional police officer faces off against a gang of thugs as he tries to bring order to the far-flung village he’s been stationed in.
Pinky Malinky sees the bright side of everything, including being born a hot dog. With his BFFs in tow, this little wiener takes a bite out of life.
A complicated, one-sided secret attraction sends ripples through the lives of a mild-mannered student and her dashing classmate.
An aspiring dancer accompanies her terminally ill mother on one last road trip that alternately strains and strengthens their knotty relationship.

Hoping to reunite with a dying friend, two longtime pals re-create their desert road trip from Spain to Mali, bringing along his estranged daughter.

Snatched off the street and held for ransom, a bound and gagged woman uses her limited powers to derail her two masked abductors' carefully laid plans.
When Lee Jeong-in and Yu Ji-ho meet, something unexpected happens. Or it just may be that spring is in the air – and anything is possible.

To save his pregnant wife, an emergency room nurse unwillingly partners with an injured murder suspect in a race against time and renegade cops.

Experience the highlights of Argentine soccer team Club Atlético River Plate's long history, from its early development to its major victories.
In this new take on a classic tale, an ancient snake spirit transforms into a beautiful woman and falls in love with a doctor unaware of her true form.

norm_title: bangkok love stories objects of affection
description: A kind computer repairman falls for a street-smart graffiti artist whose multiple personality disorder worsens after she witnesses a double murder.
When the National Assembly suffers a catastrophic attack, Minister of Environment Park Mu-jin must find a way to lead Korea through the ensuing chaos.

norm_title: dreamworks kung fu panda awesome secrets
description: In this pair of adventures, Po tells the story of how masters Thundering Rhino, Storming Ox and Croc met and takes on Shifu's biggest challenge yet.

Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.

Fifteen years after the Second Impact, apathetic teen Shinji joins his father's group NERV to fight the Angels. But the truth may destroy them all.
Fights, friendships, dating, rules. Teenage life is full of drama. But behind bars, the stakes are so much higher.

Fiercely independent and disillusioned with love, a teen DJ is determined to chart her own path, till a pop heartthrob falls for her awesome mix.

Haunted by a traumatic past, Jessica Jones uses her gifts as a private eye to find her tormentor before he can harm anyone else in Hell's Kitchen.
On a long-awaited trip to Europe, a New York City cop and his hairdresser wife scramble to solve a baffling murder aboard a billionaire's yacht.
On a field trip to Petra, two jinns – one good, the other evil – enter the human realm, turning high school into a supernatural battleground.

norm_title: oprah presents when they see us now
description: Oprah Winfrey talks with the exonerated men once known as the Central Park Five, plus the cast and producers who tell their story in "When They See Us."
Working in an orphanage, Alia meets teen Nadia, who says she hears a strange voice in the walls. When they try to find the source, things go very wrong.

norm_title: rolling thunder revue a bob dylan story by martin scorsese

An artist muddles through a midlife crisis while trying to balance his dimming career with a yearning to be a better father.
America's fate rests in the hands of a low-level official after an attack on Washington decimates the government in this gripping political thriller.
In 1901 Spain, Elisa Sánchez Loriga adopts a male identity in order to marry the woman she loves, Marcela Gracia Ibeas. Based on true events.
Following humanity's mass extinction, a teen raised alone by a maternal droid finds her entire world shaken when she encounters another human.
Pretending to marry in order to cohabitate, a small-town couple lands in endless awkward situations to hide the truth from their orthodox families.

Returning to San Francisco after a long absence, Mary Ann Singleton reunites with the community of characters at 28 Barbary Lane.
This documentary follows the life of Clarence Avant, the ultimate, uncensored mentor and behind-the-scenes rainmaker in music, film, TV and politics.
A woman sexually assaulted by her new boss's brother-in-law tries to move on as if nothing happened, but the night weighs heavily on her mind and body.

Despondent on a desolate island, a suicidal sheep is thrown a lifeline by a quirky salesman, who offers him the gift of a lifetime.

On the heels of Junior Rescue training, Team Flounder returns to brave the beach in a series of thrilling saves and lighthearted laughs.

To carry out her dad's wish and discover her roots, Dai Tian-qing embarks on a journey around Taiwan and finds love and redemption on the way.

Awkward 16-year-old Andrei is infatuated with his alluring but aloof schoolmate Ramona – until he meets stunning hotel clerk Anemona while on vacation.
Raised in a boxing gym, two orphaned brothers become highly skilled martial artists and must combat threats in the streets and the ring.

When his mother suffers a traumatic incident, a boy from the Mumbai slums treks to Delhi to deliver his written plea for justice to the Prime Minister.
After a five-year suspension, a once-legendary race car driver decides to get back in the game against a new generation of opponents.

Stranded at a summer camp when aliens attack the planet, four teens with nothing in common embark on a perilous mission to save the world.
Nola Darling struggles to stay true to herself and her dreams while juggling three lovers in this Spike Lee series based on his breakout film.
In this twisty horror-thriller, a once-promising music prodigy reconnects with her former mentors, only to find them taken with a talented new pupil.
Desperate to secure funding for her med tech startup, an idealistic scientist and her husband strike an outrageous deal with a mysterious investor.

norm_title: lonely island presents the unauthorized bash brothers experience

After discovering the family of Solomon Linda, the writer of "The Lion Sleeps Tonight," a reporter tries to help them fight for fair compensation.

Fearless Dennis, his loyal dog Gnasher and best friends Rubi, JJ and Pieface quench their thirst for adventure by wreaking havoc all over Beanotown.
Wanting his missing father to come home, a Kashmiri boy repeatedly attempts to call God for help – until one day, a hardened army officer picks up.
Love blooms between a bubbly, aspiring voice actress and a cool, enigmatic violin-maker after they cross paths on a reality TV show.
In this sequel to the 1991 film, a determined fire investigator recruits an imprisoned arsonist to help untangle a web of fire, murder and corruption.
This celebration of the groundbreaking comedy show "Laugh-In" stars Lily Tomlin, Snoop Dogg, Billy Crystal, Tiffany Haddish, Neil Patrick Harris and more.
Buoyed by hopeful experiences with medical marijuana, physicians and parents of children with cancer call for more research of its healing potential.
When a long list of shenanigans lands Tyler in hot water, he’s forced to suit up and spend his summer training for an elite junior lifeguard program.

norm_title: merata how mum decolonised the screen
description: New Zealand film archivist Heperi Mita traces the cinematic legacy of his mother and trailblazing Maori filmmaker Merata Mita.
After surviving a near-fatal injury on the job, a cop sets out to investigate a conspiracy involving the top brass of the police department.
An odd encounter with a fan and a tryst with that fan's ex-boyfriend leads a sexually adventurous singer on an escapade in Chile.
Fresh out of juvenile detention in Marseille, 17-year-old Zach falls for a young prostitute and soon faces a dire dilemma while working as a pimp.
In 1920s Beijing, a host of talented performers gather to show off their skills. The challenge: reproduce a magic trick called the Eight Immortals.
This eclectic, star-studded anthology follows diverse Chicagoans fumbling through the modern maze of love, sex, technology and culture.
After her partner cheats on her, an architect returns to her hometown to reassess her life with the help of her eccentric family. Based on the novel.
At the Sacramento County Jail, incarcerated women fight the power and one another as they try to make the best of life – and love – on the inside.
A scandal erupts in Brazil during an investigation of alleged government corruption via oil and construction companies. Loosely inspired by true events.
A princess descended from a ruined noble family disguises herself as the woman who saved her life and embarks on a mission to avenge her loved ones.
When everyone else mysteriously vanishes from their wealthy town, the teen residents of West Ham must forge their own society to survive.
When longtime friends meet up for a wine-soaked birthday getaway in Napa Valley, their perfectly planned weekend turns messier by the minute.
When a zealous gang leader plans to take out a friend-turned-rival for control of his turf, internal tensions complicate the battle to be the boss.
A high-achieving 11-year-old student embarks on a journey of self-discovery at a school on a nearby island as he grapples with tensions at home.
When a busy mother and father realize they need help with their two young children, they hire a series of maids, often with humorous results.
Two female friends, each with confidence issues, help each other search for true love and deal with their romantic rivals.
Dedicated engineering student Iris succumbs to love and marries, but fate holds both tragedies and triumphs for her personal and professional life.
A wedding planner and an ex-Marine both have been unlucky in love. But a chance meeting and a spat over a parking space soon change all that.
When a young man determines to discover his father's true identity, he faces unexpected realizations that shake his sense of self.
An aspiring actor uses a magical book to transport himself inside the movies he had always dreamed of starring in – but not without consequences.
A single mom and skilled chef yearns for her children to settle down and offers them life lessons through the special dishes she creates.
A young trio aims to protect the world from evil, armed with magic crystals that allow them to control time, commune with spirits, and more.
After the death of a loved one, a woman decides to pursue her passion for writing by penning television scripts.
When accused of a murder eerily parallel to a plot in his novel, a best-selling crime writer must navigate a web of hidden enemies.
A commercial diver becomes trapped on the ocean floor with dwindling oxygen and little hope of a timely rescue, so he tries to save himself.
A looming collision with Jupiter threatens Earth as humans search for a new star. The planet's fate now lies in the hands of a few unexpected heroes.
After starting a family of his very own in America, a gay filmmaker documents his loving, traditional Chinese family's process of acceptance.
An enterprising cupcake and his cheerful dinosaur brother take on jobs of all sorts as they work to help friends and strangers in their eccentric city.
After their mother's death, four sisters learn a shocking family secret and embark on an adventure to discover the truth about their genealogy.

norm_title: extremely wicked shockingly evil and vile
description: Single mother Liz falls for Ted Bundy and refuses to believe the truth about his crimes for years. A drama based on a true story.
On the run from a dogged internal affairs agent, a corrupt cop reluctantly teams up with a defiant teen to unravel a conspiracy – before it's too late.
Free-spirited toucan Tuca and self-doubting song thrush Bertie are best friends – and birds – who guide each other through life's ups and downs.
A man who hopes to bring light to his village must compete with an officer from the electricity department to win over the love of his life.
A disgraced Secret Service agent must come to the rescue when Korean terrorists descend on the White House and take the president hostage.

norm_title: john yoko above us only sky
description: Featuring interviews and never-before-seen footage, this film tells the story behind John Lennon and Yoko Ono’s seminal 1971 album, “Imagine.”
Go behind the scenes as four determined women – including Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez – challenge big-money politicians in the 2018 race for Congress.
Haunted by terrifying visions, a Muslim healer finds his faith tested when he helps a woman locked in battle, body and soul, with a diabolical leader.
A group of small-town students goes for glory by competing in a statewide kabaddi tournament 25 years after their school's championship victory.
When a neighbor blocks their view of the city with a commercial billboard, a Hong Kong family resorts to drastic, imaginative measures to take it down.
In a world known as the Copper Dimension, a group of high-school girls fights against dark forces – and their own inner demons.
The intimate lives of young men and women from Hong Kong are linked by loosely connected stories about love, lust, separation and deceit.
As a guardian of space-time order, 28-year-old Wang Dadong returns to Bale High School to investigate an anomaly and clashes with King.
In the Silver Dimension, Liu Bei, Guan Yu and Zhang Fei plan to enroll in an elite academy as sworn brothers, but KO One visitors derail the plan.
A time quake propels Wang Dadong into the future, where he encounters a classmate named King who presides over the KO One.
A trio of delinquent brothers fends off neighborhood rivals until one joins a gang to gain protection for the upper-class girl he loves.
Thirty years later, Ash Williams – demon hunter par excellence – is back to battle a new Deadite plague. He may have lost a hand, but not his touch.
At a 50-year-old house that served as a school, a brothel, and now a home, tales unfold of the residents who have lived there, longing for an escape.
Haunted by eerie visions and sinister impulses after a heart transplant, a teenager tries to unmask the truth behind her donor's mysterious death.
When a newly single photographer is forced to work with a longtime rival, the battle of their egos turns into a chance for love.
When his daughter and son-in-law fall prey to a scam, Istanbul con man Asım Noyan meets his match in a madcap kingpin of an underground gambling world.
Yearning for a lavish life abroad, an entitled, lazy sexist crafts a scam to ditch his thankless nursing job and find a wealthy spouse to secure a visa.
Cloaked in mystery, bluesman Robert Johnson left his mark on American music. Now family, critics and famous fans look for the real man behind the music.
Embark on a global cultural journey into street food and discover the stories of the people who create the flavorful dishes.
A gifted engineer flees his austere roots to pursue wealth and success among Copenhagen's elite, but the pride propelling him threatens to be his ruin.
It lit up jazz and hip-hop – and ignited a war on drugs steeped in racial injustice. Experts explore America's complicated relationship with weed.

norm_title: brené brown the call to courage
description: With humor and empathy, Brené Brown discusses what it takes to choose courage over comfort in a culture defined by scarcity, fear and uncertainty.
Gifted with special powers, fighting skills and slick hair, the rowdy KO One navigates tough friendships and high school romance.
This mockumentary series follows the peculiar lives of six eccentric – and sometimes obscene – misfits who march to their own beat.
A dejected small-town music teacher grapples with guilt and regret when his ex-pupil who once loved him returns home as the star he always wanted to be.
Heartbroken and romantically pessimistic, a commercial director meets a young artist and teaches him life-changing lessons about love.
A child star in the '80s, Samantha clings to the fringes of celebrity with hilarious harebrained schemes to launch herself back into the spotlight.
On the heels of a blindsiding breakup, music journalist Jenny braces for a new beginning – and one last adventure with her closest friends.
A rebellious teen grows up to become one of Milan's most ambitious criminals during the golden years of the 'ndrangheta Mafia in the 1980s.
A willful young woman is hired to design a garden at Versailles for Louis XIV. Soon, she's ensnared in political and romantic complications.

When Tim learns that the men in his family can travel in time and change their own lives, he decides to go back and win the woman of his dreams.
A down-and-out Hollywood actor is utterly unprepared for the eccentricities that await when an Indian producer offers him a role in a Bollywood film.
Indebted to a gangster, a grifter assembles a band of fellow swindlers to attempt his biggest scam yet, but it's soon clear that no one can be trusted.
Bodybuilders come together from around the world to compete in the Mr. Olympia competition and try to achieve their goals of physical perfection.
In a politically charged India of the 1970s, three friends are transformed by personal ideologies, dangerous ambitions and matters of the heart.
Juggling personal predicaments and workplace woes, three buddies and bandmates practice for their ultimate dream: winning a coveted music competition.
Still a virgin at 32 years old, a frustrated advertising agent gets the shock of his life when an unlikely chain of events turns him into a porn star.
Mistreated by his cruel uncle, an imaginative orphan with autism sees hope when a fairy vows to change his life with a week of enchanted recipes.
When a novelist seeks inspiration by urging his wife to have an affair, the line between his story and his real life grows disconcertingly blurry.
Unexpected wildlife adventures and valuable life lessons await seven city kids when they suddenly become lost in the forest during a school field trip.
When a prank goes wrong, a shy kid from Compton is sent away for murder. Four years later, he’s back and out for revenge on homecoming weekend.
Still pining for Josh, the boy who dumped her ages ago, whip-smart lawyer Rebecca jettisons her New York life and moves to California to win him back.

norm_title: who would you take to a deserted island
description: On their last night together, four longtime flatmates' lives are suddenly upended when a secret is revealed during the course of an evening celebration.
When Dilek becomes haunted by evil spirits and loses control of her body, she seeks the help of a woman with dark secrets to cure her.
Ahead of her wedding, Kübra is possessed by demons. When an examination reveals more horror, her friend, a psychiatrist, tries to perform an exorcism.
Eager to reconnect with his son, French comedy star Gad Elmaleh moves to LA, only to discover that he's left all his fame and celebrity perks behind.
To earn money for college, a high schooler launches an app offering his services as a fake date. But when real feelings emerge, things get complicated.
Still rebounding from a breakup, Jessica Day moves in with three single guys, all of whom are ready to help her understand the ways of the world.
An exploration of different personas in an eclectic collection of four works by critically acclaimed Korean directors.
With the world under attack by deadly creatures who hunt by sound, a teen and her family seek refuge outside the city and encounter a mysterious cult.
An aspiring musician battles age-old caste divides to be able to learn the art of a classical instrument from a traditionalist, veteran percussionist.
An affable, newly appointed college warden proves to be no ordinary man when an old enemy resurfaces and exposes his complicated, violent past.
This series traces the tragic case of Kalief Browder, a Bronx teen who spent three horrific years in jail, despite never being convicted of a crime.
The U.S. Navy Seal team tackles a top-secret mission at a research center where scientists have mysteriously disappeared and another life form awaits.
Ricky Gervais created and stars in this heartwarming comedy-drama series as a loyal English nursing home caretaker who sees only the good in everyone.
Supported by a team of fellow thieves, a con artist lures her targets into matrimony and then absconds with their fortunes in this darkly comic series.
Experience our planet's natural beauty and examine how climate change impacts all living creatures in this ambitious documentary of spectacular scope.
After a tragedy at a school sends shock waves through a wealthy Stockholm suburb, a seemingly well-adjusted teen finds herself on trial for murder.
This stylish mix of documentary and historical epic chronicles the reign of Commodus, the emperor whose rule marked the beginning of Rome's fall.
After failing out of art school and taking a humdrum office job, a whimsical painter gets a chance to fulfill her lifelong dream of adopting a unicorn.
After a pregnant woman is murdered, her spirit seeks revenge against her increasingly terrified killers, who are determined to finish her off for good.
Shocking secrets begin to unravel when the aftermath of a car crash leaves four best friends questioning the truth of their relationships.

norm_title: ek ladki ko dekha toh aisa laga
description: As her family seeks to marry her off and a hopeful writer pursues her, a small-town woman struggles to reveal the long-hidden truth about who she loves.
In early 1990s Malaysia, a Tamilian boy faces pressure from his immigrant father to focus on school but is drawn to his uncles’ lives of crime.
This high-energy animated series follows a gutsy kid and his trusty race-car pal as they save their city from bad guys and their scary vehicles.
A college stud tries to level up his relationship with a computer science major after becoming attracted to her skills in an online role-playing game.
When a guileless young woman becomes the domestic worker in a wealthy Dubai household, her bond with her posh employer changes both of their lives.
Seeing the chance to enrich himself by deceiving a blind heiress, clever con man Oh Soo just does what comes naturally – but his plans soon change.
A man returns home to Atlanta to try and turn around his family's struggling restaurant with the help of a new chicken recipe.
Fifteen years after a traumatic crime, a woman is released from psychiatric care and tries to drive out an evil spirit that continues to haunt her.
When a man is left to die inside an illegal gold mine, his daughter travels through a magical landscape to save him.
On India's Independence Day, a zany mishap in a Mumbai chawl disrupts a young love story while compelling the residents to unite in aid of a little boy.
Alone in Finland, a retired Mexican boxer lives in desolation under the weight of an agonizing past, until he gets a shot at redemption in the ring.
In near-future Paris, two brilliant siblings unveil a high-tech implant designed to pair up soul mates. But the beta test yields unwelcome surprises.
They're ordinary husband and wife realtors until she undergoes a dramatic change that sends them down a road of death and destruction. In a good way.
Two steely former Texas Rangers are tasked with tracking and killing infamous criminals Bonnie and Clyde in this crime drama based on real events.
An urban legend about a duffel bag of cocaine buried in the Caribbean leads a misfit band to hatch a nutball plan to find it in this comic documentary.
Social pressure, a complicated past and a clash of values beset the life of a businessman and his family.
As World War II ends, a young English woman agrees to help an enigmatic American agent root out Russian infiltration of the British government.
King Louis XIV of France commissions a lavish palace that becomes a fierce battleground for love and politics – and a gilded prison for nobility.
Seven men and women board a pink bus in search of true love. On a journey through Asia with strangers, their goal is to return to Japan as a couple.
Adapted from a best-selling novel, this horror film shows Risa befriending ghosts until an evil spirit tries to take her sister to the other side.
Polygamy, piety and personal principles collide for a charming and congenial young university student struggling in a four-way love triangle.
An aspiring yet aimless actor takes over his ailing father's job as an ambulance driver, unwittingly getting involved in an organ-trafficking network.
A police officer and a drug lord become embroiled in a cycle of revenge, each man bent on taking the other down.
In this adaptation of the comic strip, Juan López must balance an office job with heroic feats to save the love of his life and native planet Chitón.
While investigating a bank robbery, a squad of overweight police officers undergoes rigorous training to shed pounds.
As Delhi reels in the aftermath of a gang rape, DCP Vartika Chaturvedi leads a painstaking search for the culprits. Based on the 2012 Nirbhaya case.
A space-time continuum glitch allows Vera to save a boy's life 25 years earlier, but results in the loss of her daughter, whom she fights to get back.
The killing of three members of the Miami Showband sent shock waves across Ireland in 1975. Now one survivor doggedly pursues the truth.
In this social drama of sin and remorse, a man reels at the discovery that his wife has been unfaithful, and gives her an ultimatum.
In this unflinching biopic based on Mötley Crüe's best-selling book, four LA misfits navigate the monster highs and savage lows of music superstardom.
Seven years after vanishing from her home, a young woman returns with mysterious new abilities and recruits five strangers for a secret mission.

norm_title: antoine griezmann the making of a legend
description: With heart and determination, Antoine Griezmann overcame his small stature to become one of the world’s top soccer players and a World Cup champion.
She's the most unlikely candidate to ever stumble into the role of a reporter, and she’s keeping everyone on their toes with her eccentric ways.
Now a celebrity, Benjie is tasked with taking care of a General's young son, who has information about a looming terrorist threat.
Following his best friend's death, Arci takes charge of her two boisterous children with some help from their gang-affiliated uncle.
When aspiring fashion designer Andi reconnects with her ex-boyfriend Max, she's surprised to learn that he's in a relationship with a man.
Tired of her husband's cheating, Anne begins a passionate new relationship – while still wondering if she should give her marriage another chance.
Love can be complicated, especially when Vince agrees to secretly woo Kath via text on behalf of James – while falling for her, too.

norm_title: alexis viera a story of surviving
description: After being shot during a robbery in Colombia and losing sensation in his legs, Uruguayan soccer star Alexis Viera finds a new sense of purpose.
As a psychology professor faces Alzheimer's, his daughter and her three close female friends experience romance, marriage, heartbreak and tragedy.
A teen with vitiligo struggles with self-doubt and anxiety until a new schoolteacher sees her through a different lens, and urges her to do the same.
Kumiko and Kenichi meet in college and build a happy marriage together. But over time, an unusual problem threatens to destroy their relationship.
A couple finds unexpected drama when, after 40 years of living in the same Brooklyn walk-up, they attempt to sell their apartment and buy a new one.
A troubled psychologist returns from the U.S. and sets up a clinic in Taiwan, where mysterious patients and uncanny events shed light on his murky past.
A PR agent trying to find her stolen phone, a politician in trouble, and a fading celebrity find their lives intertwining in unexpected, messy ways.
When his son's mom runs afoul of Paris's criminal underworld, a thrill-seeking superbike racer begins moonlighting as a drug courier to clear her debt.
Fifteen-year-old ballet dancer Lara faces physical and emotional hurdles as she prepares for gender confirmation surgery. Inspired by a true story.
Eduard, a husband and father who loses his family in a tragic accident, travels to parallel universes to seek a better fate for his beloved wife.

norm_title: late life the chienming wang story
description: Injuries sidelined the bright career of New York Yankees pitcher Chien-Ming Wang. This documentary captures his relentless battle back to the majors.
After their mother's death, Amal and her brothers struggle to live with their authoritarian father, whose cruelty and neglect break the family apart.

The documentary takes a detailed look at the disappearance of 3-year-old Madeleine McCann, who vanished while on holiday with her family.
A down-and-out DJ plots to rebuild his music career while working as a nanny for his famous best friend's wild 11-year-old daughter.
Self-made millionaire Ian thinks he's found happiness when he marries caring Joanna, but his love is put to the test when he meets stewardess Karyn.
While pursuing a degree in Spain, an architecture student struggling with grief meets a fellow expatriate trying to flee a difficult family life.
A hard-driving real estate tycoon who becomes ill with cancer hires a medical caretaker who helps her begin to mend fences with her estranged son.
After a woman is very publicly left at the altar, the PR expert hired to fix the situation winds up falling in love with her.
A dying father asks his busy and grown children to spend their Sundays with him, forcing his family to confront their issues before it's too late.
After her son dies in an accident, a legal consultant is forced to prove her innocence when she's accused of his murder.
A hardworking man in a thankless job meets a mysterious doctor who sells him powerful pills that throw his life into disarray.
Loyalties are tested when five former special forces operatives reunite to steal a drug lord's fortune, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.
In 1940s Port Said, Kariman finds comfort and solace in the arms of an unhappily married man, who also happens to be her abusive husband's brother.
The lives of a wealthy couple hiding their marital problems intersect with a group of hackers and the young women they exploit.
