description: A model student resorts to violence after witnessing greed and corruption wreak havoc on his life.
Following the shooting death of his older brother, a depressed and aimless 13-year-old boy falls in with a gang in rural Arkansas.
A YouTuber becomes obsessed with figuring out how his copycat archnemesis manages to steal all of his ideas.
Iconoclastic film director Brian DePalma takes a look back at the production of such classic movies as "Carrie," "Scarface" and "The Untouchables."
After several failed attempts at taking his own life, a young man hires an aging assassin who’ll do anything to fend off retirement.
A surgeon’s perfect life is rattled when his daughter is taken hostage in their own home and he's given 24 hours to pay a hefty ransom.
After a series of strange deaths, a high school reporter tries to pin down the killer who's targeting students eligible for a prestigious scholarship.
As his father takes steps to move on, a New Yorker grieving his mom's death visits Los Angeles where new possibilities may bring him out of his funk.
A father and son bond on an impromptu road trip over deep conversations, unexpected confessions, strange encounters ... and a drunken escapade.
Finding a letter mailed to Santa by a girl asking for a new wife for her daddy, twentysomething Crystal sets out to make the girl's wishes come true.
When a Los Angeles family's patriarch dies, his dutiful eldest son plans the funeral – which becomes a fiasco thanks to a colorful cast of attendees.
Two federal agents battle through an army of rioting prisoners – and their sense of reality – inside a high-tech prison modeled after Dante’s Inferno.
Former FBI agent Joe Pistone, the real-life "Donnie Brasco," hosts this series that reveals the true stories of undercover crime-fighting operations.
Back in Bondi Beach, where she grew up, DC Tori Lustigman investigates a gay man's murder and finds a link to her brother's death decades earlier.
Hired by a singer to defend her friend, who has been accused of murder, a formidable lawyer learns that the man he represents may not be innocent.

norm_title: defying the nazis the sharps war
description: This film documents the story of minister Waitstill Sharp and his wife, Martha, who risked everything to save thousands of refugees fleeing the Nazis.
A man with a history of mental issues moves into his late parents' mansion and comes to suspect his new home may be haunted.
A highly skilled crew of bank robbers plotting a heist at the supposedly impenetrable Federal Reserve faces off against an elite unit of L.A. cops.
In a severe, drought-ravaged dystopia, the youngest of a farm family starts a quest for revenge after his brothers betray him and leave him for dead.
Along with her son and best friend, a grieving widow hikes into the woods to scatter her late husband's ashes, only to discover they're being stalked.
A man begins to regret his choices when his brother decides to join him as a member of the same terrorist organization.
Convinced his stepfather caused the crash that left his mother in a coma, a law student drunkenly agrees to his murder, then can't rescind the deal.
In a tailspin after her marriage collapses, Jamie falls for a helpful gentleman whose interest in her welfare hides sinister motives.
On a small Finnish island in 1666, a teenage girl in love with a married fisherman becomes the center of a tragic witch hunt and power struggle.
Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.
After science student Shesh Shahi – a shy eccentric with a strange connection to nature – is examined by a team of mental hospital doctors, a gripping portrait of schizophrenia emerges.
By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.
Tipped off about buried money in Goa, four ne’er-do-well friends go on the hunt, chased by a police officer who wants the treasure for himself.
Framed by an empress who plans to steal a dragon-taming mace, imperial magistrate Dee Renjie soon uncovers a greater plot that threatens the kingdom.

norm_title: diana 7 days that shook the world
description: This illuminating documentary examines the aftermath of Princess Diana’s tragic death and the tense, dramatic week leading up to her funeral.
Featuring archival footage and personal recordings, this documentary offers candid insight into the life of the beloved princess.
Pierce Brosnan's final outing as 007 finds James Bond facing off against a North Korean terrorist who's in league with a British diamond merchant.
The sophisticated son of a powerful businessman falls for a simple, free-spirited girl whose older sister is in love with him.
The host of a dinner party invites his friends to bring the saddest loser they can find. But the ultimate schmuck turns everyone else into the losers.
Top scientists and paleontologists examine dinosaur fossils located throughout Canada, while searching for elusive new species.
Shaolin monk San Te returns to protect a fellow hero with a talent for finding trouble in this action-packed sequel to "The 36th Chamber of Shaolin."
Follow Todd Standing, Dr. Jeff Meldrum and other researchers into the wilderness, where they try to capture definitive proof of Sasquatch's existence.
An intelligent but intense honor student traumatizes his high school teacher and mentor when he doesn't get the grade he believes he deserves.
After years of segregation and forced labor, a race of stranded aliens enlists in a resistance movement spearheaded by a rogue government agent.
A young physician and his beautiful mistress get swept up in the danger and drama of the Bolshevik Revolution in this Oscar-winning epic.
A delusional ex-con rejoins his unhinged former partners for one last job: kidnap the baby of a mobster's enemy for ransom.
Winter the dolphin, who survived a tragic injury by receiving a prosthetic tail, bonds with an orphaned baby dolphin after her beloved pool mate dies.
A Copenhagen police officer hunts for the man who attacked his partner, only to stumble into a high-stakes game of espionage.

norm_title: don quixote the ingenious gentleman of la mancha
description: In this modern adaptation of a Spanish classic, an eccentric, elderly gentleman sets out with his honest sidekick to right the wrongs of the world.
A questionable character working as a self-styled "biblical archaeologist" advances his cause by creating phony religious artifacts.

norm_title: dont be afraid of the dark
description: Young Sally Hurst discovers she isn't alone in her new house: strange creatures live there – and they might not be as friendly as Sally thinks.
There are risks. Then there are risk-takers. In an around-the-world trip, follow athletes perform jaw-dropping acts in unpredictable elements of nature.
Using state-of-the-art technology, this stunning sequel follows athletes pulling off daring feats under extreme conditions in extraordinary locations.
Through deserts, above mountains and deep into oceans, elite athletes — both veteran and new — form bonds and pursue adventure in sumptuous landscapes.
A recovering addict becomes her estranged daughter's only hope after the teen awakens a terrifying child-stealing witch from an urban legend.
Aided by dramatic reconstructions and archive footage, Sir Richard Branson recounts his daring attempts to break hot air balloon records.
Six talented but struggling improv comics see a sudden shift in their troupe's dynamic after one of them lands a much-coveted gig on television.
When FBI agent Joe Pistone goes undercover to infiltrate the mob, he starts to identify with the made men he's charged with taking down.
A special ops squad investigating a distress signal from a distant planet discovers that mutant aliens have already wiped out most of the population.
When the tenant in their flat dies under suspicious circumstances, two bickering cousins are forced to navigate both sides of the law.
Sister Aloysius begins to have doubts about doting Father Flynn, who seems to have become overly involved in the life of an African American pupil.
The human-equine bond propels the unique and challenging sport of reined cow horse, in which dedicated trainers compete for the national championship.

norm_title: dr seuss the cat in the hat
description: While Mom is away, a bored little boy and girl are visited by the Cat in the Hat, who proceeds to turn the house into the "mother of all messes."
A grump with a mean streak plots to bring Christmas to a halt in the cheerful town of Whoville. But a generous little girl could change his heart.
In ancient times when majestic fire-breathers soared through the skies, a knight comes face to face and heart to heart with the last dragon on Earth.
When an aspiring knight crosses paths with a dragon, the two form an unlikely alliance in a high-stakes battle against a malicious sorcerer.
This sequel introduces Draco the dragon's offspring, Drake, who dreams of becoming a knight and teams up with a stable boy to master his skills.
When the king of Brittania dies, the dragon who shares his heart must find a new ruler, but the monarch's grandchildren go to war over the throne.
A huge fan of a Korean TV drama is transported to a magical realm where she has the power to alter her favorite show's story line as a "Facilitator."
Narrated by Jeff Bridges, this compelling documentary examines some incredible achievements of engineering from across the globe.
On a cruise for gay men, five passengers of different nationalities take a break from their families and cultures to party and reflect on life.
This documentary explores the intense passion and distinctive talent that make Dries Van Noten one of the most unique fashion designers in the world.
A young dancer grapples with her dream to join a famed ballet company against the wishes of her mother, who pushes her to pursue a more practical path.
This absorbing documentary series follows the entire supply chain of the illicit drug trade, tracing its production, export, sale and consumption.
A young mother embarks on a desperate quest for freedom when she kidnaps her 10-year-old daughter to save her from a tribal marriage.
When one of his colleagues becomes corrupted by power and goes over to the dark side, a young police officer tries to bring the offender to justice.

norm_title: dumb and dumberer when harry met lloyd
description: This wacky prequel to the 1994 blockbuster goes back to the lame-brained title characters' days as classmates at a Rhode Island high school.
This documentary investigates the surge in vaping culture and whether e-cigarettes can really help smokers kick the habit.
When a construction project begins in their neighborhood, four friends start receiving bizarre encoded text messages on their cell phones.
Earth's most sublime landscapes can also be the most forbidding. Discover how inhabitants survive and flourish in our planet's harshest environments.

norm_title: earths natural wonders life at the extremes
description: From the Arctic to the Outback, humans battle the elements and use their ingenuity to survive in the most extreme environments in the world.
She’s not the usual candidate for the role, but a dogged Mexican-American mother makes it her mission to become a talented sushi chef.
When a lie about Olive's reputation transforms her from anonymous to infamous at her high school, she decides to embrace a provocative new persona.
Years after a wealthy man is healed by a rural herbalist, fate lands him in the same hospital where the woman's granddaughter is treating patients.
After deciding to reshape her life after divorce, Liz travels around the world in search of good food, spirituality and true love.
Two young adults with families on opposite ends of the political spectrum fall in love in a Kerala city torn by violence.
Driven by the lessons he learned from his mother, and the values of the Sikh religion, a man sets out on a mission to serve humanity.
A poor bus conductor's efforts at obtaining information about his enormous electricity bill are hindered by a corrupt system.
Imprisoned for underworld crimes she didn’t commit, a vengeful woman breaks free and goes scorched earth on the smooth-talking suitor who framed her.
A security expert and ex-CIA agent living in Belgium must go on the run with his estranged teen daughter when they're both marked for assassination.
Spanish-Mexican writer Paco Ignacio Taibo II hits the road to trace the footsteps of Ernesto "Che" Guevara and sheds new light on the revolutionary.
Religion thwarted Lucas and Jade's young love. They reunite decades later, but Jade's heart is torn between the man she knew and his younger clone.
This documentary chronicles the decade-long process that led to the end of the ETA, a Basque terrorist group that operated for more than 50 years.
Regional Mexican singer El Vato and his friends struggle to succeed in the enticing but deceptive music world in Los Angeles, California.
Popular South American bands Márama and Rombai share footage of behind-the-scenes antics and discuss their sudden rise to stardom.
Friends Proog and Emo live in a capricious, seemingly infinite machine with a sinister purpose in this experimental computer-animated short.
A blend of the royal family's intimate recollections and rarely seen home movies pays tribute to Queen Elizabeth II on the eve of her 90th birthday.
When a young newlywed enters the one chamber in her husband’s mansion that’s off-limits, she faces the horrifying consequences of defying the rules.
Trace the overlapping journeys of exceptional women swept up in World War I and hear their tales of bravery on history's front lines.
Mothers, nurses, soldiers and deportees – these women fought against persecution for freedom and survival amid the turbulence of World War II.
From Asia, Africa and Latin America, five women share extraordinary stories of strength and determination in the face of violence and inequality.
Then and now footage of bit players who appeared in "Star Wars" tells the story of how the film and its legions of fans changed their lives forever.
A suburban couple hires a new sitter to watch their three kids for the night, unaware that the young woman isn't who she claims to be.
In 1950s Makassar, the life of a devoted mother is upended when another woman enters her husband's life.
Expelled from private school for attempted suicide, emo Ethan enters the world of Seymour High and meets a cute Christian who's ready to convert him.
This documentary explores the extent to which our sense of smell directs our survival instincts and enriches our sensual experiences.
Warehouse workers Vince and Zack compete in a full-on war to be named Employee of the Month and win a date with their dream girl.
This fictional series tells the stories of what happens to people when they feel caged in, whether physically, psychologically or emotionally.
After accidentally killing a young mobster, a guilt-stricken police officer searches for the parents who never came forward to claim their son's body.
This documentary series tries to get at the root of some of the most heinous crimes ever committed by deranged, cold-blooded criminals.
Officers Taylor and Zavala patrol the streets of South Central Los Angeles, an area of the city ruled by gangs and riddled with drug violence.
Siblings separated as children who no longer recognize each other are pitted against each other in a war involving drugs, crime and betrayal.
When a humdrum academic spots his double in a movie, he launches a search that leads him to a small-time actor who looks exactly like him.
This documentary digs deep to recount the saga of the superstar self-help guru convicted of negligent homicide in the deaths of three followers.
After his ailing father makes a shocking confession, a desperately depressed man sets out to find the woman he believes will change his destiny.
Recruited by a British agent, Shaolin master Lee infiltrates a remote island and a brutal martial arts tournament to spy on a sinister crime lord.
Two young lovers depart from the norm simply by having romantic feelings for each other in a society where humans have been relieved of all emotions.
In a dystopian future, a totalitarian regime maintains peace by subduing the populace with a drug, and displays of emotion are punishable by death.
Artistic rebellion ignites at the movies when film characters suddenly speak freely to the audience, prompting a surly censor to combat the uprising.
An ill and addled man recalls what seems to be a brief but powerful past romance with a kindred spirit, a young Russian woman who lived a lonely life.
While investigating a brutal string of deaths, a detective begins to suspect that mind control may have played a part in the murders.
An entrepreneur prone to partying and his estranged brother, a teacher resigned to a humdrum life, begin to bond under fragile circumstances.
God summons narcissistic Evan to build an ark in preparation for a flood. Meanwhile, Evan's family interprets his new hobby as a midlife crisis.
After a signal is received from a long-missing spaceship, a rescue ship investigates, but the crew soon realizes something unimaginable has happened.
After a paramedic’s violent death during a weekend trip, his spirit inhabits his friends’ bodies in an effort to save them from a similar fate.
Journeying back to her small Spanish hometown for her sister's wedding, Laura must grapple with long-buried secrets when her daughter is abducted.
Materials scientist Mark Miodownik takes us into the world of everyday objects that make our lives more comfortable than those of our ancestors.
After two community college geology professors discover microscopic alien life-forms on a meteorite, the military and government become involved.
A coder at a tech company wins a week-long retreat at the compound of his company's CEO, where he's tasked with testing a new artificial intelligence.
Still haunted by the traumatic event that ended her high school romance, a young professional gets a new subordinate: her former sweetheart.
Young journalists working for a magazine juggle careers, romance and other challenges while reporting on social issues and news stories in Malaysia.
When terrorists hijack a 747 and turn it into a nerve gas bomb aimed at Washington, D.C., commandos use an experimental plane to try to stop them.
Featuring interviews with participants on all sides, this documentary questions Norway and the West's protracted military involvement in Afghanistan.
Maverick cop Orin Boyd joins forces with an unlikely ally in gangster Latrell Walker to take down a group of dirty Detroit cops.
Mistakenly accused of kidnapping, a veteran soldier leaves a trail of broken bad guys in his wake as he tries to rescue a teen sex trafficking victim.
Grasping hungrily for stardom, bit actor Andy Millman and his pal Maggie spend their days chasing after work as film and TV extras.
A clarinet player who lives with his grandparents in a small village is forced to move to Istanbul, where he meets a singer enjoying sudden fame.
Hüseyin has found his father, and now has one more mission – to get together with the girl of his dreams, with a little help from his new friend.
Life is tough for Hüseyin after marrying his true love. He works day and night to support his growing family, while singer Firuzan copes with fame.
A young man framed for a crime escapes a prison sentence by faking his own death and assuming a new identity as he seeks revenge.
Maddy and Cole were inseparable before high school. Then she got popular; he didn't. But after Maddy is betrayed, she and Cole reunite – to ruin prom.
Two former friends, who now live far apart, learn about each other's insecurities and secrets over a series of video chats.
Fiona Bruce and Philip Mould use investigative skills and scientific techniques to determine if paintings are real or just impressive forgeries.
A young man enlists the help of his friends to avenge his uncle's death by taking on a powerful, unscrupulous politician.
Following a night of hard partying that left their tycoon boss dead, four women try to keep it a secret in hopes of closing a billion-dollar deal.
A tough homicide cop faces his most dangerous assignment when he must stop a murderous evil spirit who can move from one host to the next.
An ex-con struggles to take care of his two brothers, a gambling addict and a young man with Down syndrome, after being released from prison.
Follow an 11-year-old boy as he goes from ordinary child to colorful competitor in his quest for a big win at India’s biggest kite-flying festival.
When a successful young rap star has an affair with an obsessive fan, his life is turned upside down when she kidnaps him.
A beauty expert, a drug dealer and a bungling revolutionary end up in the grips of an extremist group after meeting on a plane to Lebanon.
A young man from a humble family is drawn into a life of crime – and soon confronts a determined cop in hot pursuit.
A modest, compassionate priest doubles as an effective crime solver in this series based on the short stories by G.K. Chesterton.

norm_title: fear and loathing in las vegas
description: A sportswriter and his Samoan lawyer embark on a hallucinogenic three-day romp from Los Angeles to Las Vegas in this counterculture cult favorite.

norm_title: fear files har mod pe darr
description: Possessed lovers, witches, haunted houses and more bring tales of horror to the screen in this anthology series.
Talking squarely to the hip-hop generation, musicians, athletes and others outline the benefits of exercise, a healthy diet and spiritual wellness.
This adaptation of the musical chronicles the trials of a Jewish peasant, his wife, and their three strong-willed daughters in pre-revolutionary Russia.
Quirky little Figaro has a whole alphabet's worth of phobias. These wordless animated shorts follow his many fears from A to Z.
In this documentary, passionate high schoolers travel the country and come of age during a turbulent yearlong prep for a national speech competition.
In 19th-century Istanbul, a young police officer investigates crimes and falls in love with the daughter of a wealthy merchant conspiring against him.
Leon Vitali had a thriving acting career most others would envy. Then he gave it all up to devote himself completely to the vision of Stanley Kubrick.
The level-headed owner of a struggling coffee shop finds his future at risk when his partner – a talented but cocky barista – makes a major bet.
After narrowly avoiding a fatal plane explosion, a group of seemingly lucky teen classmates finds that Death is not so easily cheated.
On a road trip with friends, Kimberly has a premonition that saves everyone from a freak accident. More terrifying visions prompt her to seek help.
When a girl prevents her premonition of a deadly roller-coaster mishap from coming true, the survivors must face the consequences of cheating death.
Heartbreak, hope and nostalgia collide in this complex portrait of Lampedusa, a Mediterranean island where thousands of migrants land each year.
Grappling with love and loss in their respective lives, two estranged brothers must confront their traumatic, unresolved past when they cross paths.
Unaware they’ve matched online, a struggling writer embellishes his lifestyle to impress a successful exec with whom he sparks an unexpected romance.
A stock broker brings his young son back to the town where he grew up for a hunting trip, but things take a dangerous turn when they witness a crime.
A young couple fights supernatural foes in an attempt to save their daughter from the dark and mysterious forces that follow her every move.
In this exploration of the life-changing power of the ocean, six people from very different backgrounds find purpose and meaning in the sea.
Top athletes from around the globe test their fitness in a four-day competition at the first-ever CrossFit Sanctional event. Let the games begin.
When five ninjas whose fighting styles are based on natural elements unleash their fury on a rival school, a lone survivor vows deadly revenge.
A college professor goes up against the giants of the auto industry when they fail to give him credit for inventing intermittent windshield wipers.
Nosy family in tow, a fun-loving bachelor goes on a romantic getaway, but he ends up pretending to be married to a complete stranger to avoid trouble.
One night in 1959, four young musicians venture from Pasadena to South-Central Los Angeles in the hopes of hearing a living jazz legend play.
The emperor's reign of terror expands. Heroic outlaw Ma Teng joins a squad of female rebels, whose leader is torn between family loyalties.
Aspiring to be an internet celebrity and make big bucks, a filmmaker travels the world to learn the tricks of the trade from social media influencers.
In this series, TV presenter Michael Mosley and botanist James Wong explore the physics, chemistry and biology inside every bite of food we eat.
Familial bonds strain as dramas concerning love, greed, business and generosity simmer across generations.

norm_title: footprints the path of your life
description: This documentary follows 10 men who agree to walk the Camino de Santiago, a 500-mile, 40-day trek that will challenge their strength and faith.
This adaptation of Ntozake Shange's play consists of a series of poetic vignettes that explore the lives of modern African American women.
As chef Curtis Duffy oversees every aspect of opening his own restaurant, Grace, he recalls his turbulent childhood and difficult adult relationships.
When a vicious war against Catholics is waged in Mexico in the 1920s, a retired general joins the militia fighting to preserve religious freedom.
When a goofy but likable millionaire discovers his fiancée’s plan to steal his wealth, he devises an unromantic scheme to make her life a living hell.
A woman with a passion for fowl keeps a menagerie of birds that draws the ire of neighbors, animal rights advocates and even her own family.

norm_title: forbidden games the justin fashanu story
description: This documentary chronicles the tragic, true story of Justin Fashanu, the first – and only – openly gay man to have played professional soccer.
A pulp-fiction sci-fi classic, Forbidden Planet stars Leslie Nielsen as a heroic starship captain who finds the paradise planet Altair-IV.
This dynamic series spans the globe to explain the complex natural forces that govern the planet, from shape and color to motion and the elements.
In the wake of the plane crash that claimed the lives of 71 people, the Brazilian soccer club Chapecoense seeks to rebuild the team that made history.
The furor over the addition of two Muslim players to the Beitar Jerusalem soccer club underscores the role of institutionalized racism in Israel.
Teenage Xue Ming was forced to marry the man who raped her. Years after abandoning her young sons to find a better life, can she escape the guilt?
According to the research of two food scientists, the popularity of processed foods has led to epidemic rates of obesity, diabetes and other diseases.
A dating couple is forced to spend their first Christmas together visiting each of their four divorced parents – in a single day.
A commitment-phobic Brit tries to reconnect with an alluring American who's about to make a seemingly awful mistake by marrying a wealthy, boring man.
Ted Crawford, who allegedly attempted to murder his wife, is now locked in a battle of wits with a young assistant district attorney.
Determined to make it as a modern dancer in New York, a young woman pursues her unlikely goal with more enthusiasm than natural talent.
Frasier Crane is a snooty but lovable Seattle psychiatrist who dispenses advice on his call-in radio show while ignoring it in his own relationships.
Forced to attend a new high school, a glamorous teen navigates hostile territory before taking a stand by running for homecoming queen.
The holiday season is ruined for Santa Claus when his cranky older brother – a repo man with a sizable rap sheet – visits him at the North Pole.
Ordered to clean up the graffiti he painted at a marine theme park, a troubled young boy unexpectedly bonds with a killer whale on exhibit.
Take in the true account of drug kingpin "Freeway" Rick Ross's empire and how the CIA helped him fuel America's  devastating crack cocaine epidemic.
When climate change makes Egypt freeze over, intelligence officers pose as a film crew on location to seek a device that can eliminate the frost.
An aimless, unemployed millennial hangs out with his pals and resists growing up, until an affair with his best friend's girl forces him to change.
A devout preacher's son leaves his protective home to begin college and meets a self-reliant student who will test his faith and his heart.
This docuseries dives into the cutthroat world of Texas youth football, where kids face grueling demands and pressure from coaches and parents to win.
A group of teenage camp counselors raises the ire of Jason Voorhees, a masked, homicidal maniac, in this remake of the classic slasher flick.
A popular college student's love of social media becomes her biggest regret when a mysterious account marks each of her friends for a grisly demise.
This hit sitcom follows the merry misadventures of six 20-something pals as they navigate the pitfalls of work, life and love in 1990s Manhattan.
After his wife relocates to her home country of Japan, an Egyptian man – and father of two rambunctious kids – tries to win her back.
A low-level intelligence agent gets pulled into action and espionage above his pay grade when he's ordered to assist a trigger-happy senior agent.

norm_title: froning the fittest man in history
description: Follow the grueling training regimen of Rich Froning Jr. as he sets his sights on winning an unprecedented fourth CrossFit Games title.
Go on a journey through the Arctic and Antarctic with this visually stunning program that explores these wildernesses and their inhabitants.
On a Mohawk reservation on the Canadian border, Ray Eddy teams with a widowed tribe member to smuggle illegal immigrants into the United States.
After a debilitating accident ends her Olympic dreams, gymnast Ariana Berlin finds recovery and hope in the world of hip-hop and college athletics.
This documentary explores the challenging, transformative world of high-intensity fitness programs through the eyes of the people who've embraced them.
When traffickers kidnap her daughter from their village, vengeful Hai Phuong returns to Saigon – and her outlaw roots – to take down the abductors.
Kyle helps people disappear, but when a crazed killer starts hunting down his latest client, he has to decide what he's willing to do to keep her safe.
When a billionaire sets out to take over the world, only one special forces unit can handle the job – a squad of highly trained guinea pigs.
In a drama based on a true story, Brazilian backpacker Gabriel Buchmann spends his gap year exploring Africa. Why does he die in the Malawi mountains?
Three young, aspiring Indian rappers make their way in a cutthroat music industry, dreaming of fame, stardom and ultimate hip-hop domination .
This biopic of Russian cosmonaut Yuri Gagarin follows his rise from childhood poverty to his selection and training for the 1961 Vostok mission.
In a time of legend, Galavant the knight embarks on a quest to save his fair lady and become a hero in this tongue-in-cheek musical comedy.
Sparks fly between the new girl at school and the misfit with a passion for music. Yet the world threatens to put a stop to their innocent love song.
An army deserter hiding out in a small coastal town becomes the coach of a youth baseball team and develops warm relationships in his new community.
Training a keen eye on hot-button political topics, this variety show features stand-up comedy, sketches and sarcastic celebrity impersonations.
In the crime-ridden slums of New York in the 1860s, vengeful orphan Amsterdam Vallon joins the cutthroat gang of his father's killer, Bill the Butcher.
A determined boy will do anything to become a great soccer player, despite the wishes of his grandfather.
A young soccer player sets out to prove he can lead his team to a championship – but being a winner is about more than just talent.
Developers looking for a location to build a resort on Saipan stumble into a subterranean bunker from WWII where an evil force lies in wait.
A Punjabi woman who works on a farm must endure the difficulties of living in an oppressive class-based society and a dysfunctional community.
Despite growing up with traits that set her apart from her peers, a young adopted girl discovers her gift when she takes an interest in spelling bees.

norm_title: gender revolution a journey with katie couric
description: Katie Couric explores our evolving understanding of gender identity, speaking with transgender and intersex individuals about their experiences.
Historian Bettany Hughes travels to India, Greece and China to explore the lives and times of Buddha, Socrates and Confucius.
Historian Bettany Hughes explores the intellectual landscapes that helped shape the work of Karl Marx, Friedrich Nietzsche and Sigmund Freud.
Now on the run, a writer relates his previous year's escapades when he got sucked into the thrilling, sordid orbit of boxer and jazz man Henry Morgan.
Now married and raising a son, clumsy ape-man George finds his jungle kingdom in peril as Really Mean Lion challenges him for the throne.
With the help of brainy and adventurous sidekicks, New Mouse City's favorite journalist investigates mysteries that take him around the world,
Ambitious young record company intern Aaron must escort an unruly rock star to Los Angeles for the start of his anniversary concert.
When Santa gets arrested for trespassing after crashing his sleigh, it's up to a father-son team to spring him from jail and save Christmas.
Organized crime enforcer Miles Daly strives to reinvent himself as a Hollywood filmmaker in this satire based on Elmore Leonard's best-selling novel.
When the identities of secret agents are compromised, hapless Maxwell Smart teams with far more capable Agent 99 to thwart an evil terrorist group.
Tired of dealing with boyfriends who wrong them, gal pals Lauren, Emily and Andrea decide to turn the tables and become the players themselves.
Framed for his older brother's murder, a boxer seeks violent revenge against the true killer who's torn his family apart.
While visiting the site of a supernatural shrine in the Thai countryside, a vacationing couple unwittingly upsets a vengeful demon.
World War IV is over, but a bomb has gone off in Newport City, killing a major arms dealer who may have ties with the mysterious 501 Organization.
After selling his soul to save a loved one, daredevil biker Johnny Blaze pays the price by becoming a flame-skulled bounty hunter for Mephistopheles.
As Motoko and Batou attempt to thwart a mysterious terrorist group, Togusa tracks the killer of a man with a prosthetic leg made by Mermaid's Leg.
Freed of her responsibilities for the 501 Organization, Motoko must now learn how to take orders from Aramaki.
Giving up his life of crime for love, a gangster struggles with a moral dilemma when tragic events and enduring enemies take him back to the underworld.
Indonesian activist Soe Hok Gie experiences a political awakening during the tumultuous regimes of Suharto and Sukarno. Inspired by true events.
Gigi's an avant-garde French waif being groomed as the fille de joie of affluent and handsome Gaston. Soon Gigi metamorphoses into a stunning beauty.
With the Cold War looming over them, teen best pals Ginger and Rosa share everything in early 1960s London – until betrayal drives them apart.
Quadruplets separated as babies reunite in Manila when one needs a liver transplant, but long-held family resentments threaten to derail everything.

A man's inability to conquer his personal insecurities and distrust of other people leads to problems with his on-again, off-again wife and their son.

norm_title: maya angelou and still i rise
description: Poet and civil rights activist Maya Angelou is celebrated using her own words set over rare photographs and video illustrating her remarkable life.
Friends, family and political titans recall the impact of Atlanta's Maynard Jackson, the first African-American mayor of a major Southern city.
An orphan girl who has ambitions of marrying a rich man changes her identity to win the heart of a prominent businessman's son.
Hoping to pump up their sound, a punk band hires Pepe, a keyboardist with Down Syndrome, but tensions erupt when he steals the show with his talent.
Desperate to start a new life with his girlfriend, a teenage boy steals drug money from her father, who happens to be the town's corrupt lawman.
In New York's Little Italy, a low-level hoodlum wrestles with loyalty to his mobster uncle, his faith and his friendship with an inveterate gambler.
An elderly immigrant matriarch from Hong Kong finally begins to break out of her shell of isolation when she suspects her husband of infidelity.
In 1930s Poland, a powerful psychic steers a group of strangers toward a fated convergence that ensures survival for one and annihilation for others.

norm_title: meet the trumps from immigrant to president
description: Learn about Donald Trump's family history, including his immigrant grandfather's gold-rush enterprises and his dad's development of a property empire.
Visiting the busiest kitchens in the world, this reality series focuses on large-scale food production – and the people who make it happen.
After recovering from a tragic experience, a young woman makes a journey to her father's homeland and falls in love with a kind-hearted doctor.

norm_title: melodies of life born this way
description: A celebrated pastry chef and his fellow staff members at a bake shop embark on bittersweet adventures in love, work and friendship.
When Melvin and his friends gather for dinner, their casual conversation takes a sharp turn as they begin to disclose raw truths about themselves.
Hiding his own murderous past, a man suffering from Alzheimer's must protect his daughter from her boyfriend, who he suspects is also a serial killer.
Glimpse into the brain's vast potential for memorization through the eyes of four competitive memory athletes as they share techniques and insights.
A streetwise cop teams with a veteran government agent to work for a super-secret, extremely dapper team that monitors extraterrestrials on Earth.
Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones reprise their roles as two highly secretive and unofficial government agents dealing with all things evil and alien.
A hedonistic soccer mom takes a voyage of self-discovery when she tries to reconnect with her son by returning his pet rock to a Mediterranean island.
In this fast-paced Indonesian thriller, a young martial arts master travels to Jakarta, where he saves an orphan from a human-trafficking ring.
A simple auto-rickshaw driver on the streets of Lucknow, Hiralal Tiwari does everything he can to give his gravely ill daughter a happy life.
An unconventional high school philosophy teacher upsets a few parents and staff, romances others and inspires all his pupils, including his gay son.

norm_title: merry men the real yoruba demons
description: Four of the richest bachelors in Abuja, Nigeria enjoy a life of fast cars, palatial homes and female attention while concealing their true activities.
After a disgruntled man blames his Marathi heritage for his lack of his success, he is visited by Shivaji, a great medieval Marathi king.
When a terrorist escapes custody, MI-5 director Harry Pearce becomes the scapegoat. But the wily veteran still has some spycraft tricks up his sleeve.

norm_title: middle school the worst years of my life
description: At Hills Village Middle School, budding cartoonist Rafe and best pal Leo challenge their uptight principal by breaking every rule in his handbook.
In this talk show, comedian Mallika Dua serves up big laughs as Shalishka and whips up a meal with her celebrity pals who dish on their diets and lives.
When his son exhibits supernatural powers, a father takes the youngster on the run to protect him from government authorities and religious fanatics.
Sean Penn stars in this biopic about Harvey Milk, the openly gay San Francisco politician who was murdered by a disgruntled city supervisor in 1978.
A nameless widow juggles multiple jobs to support her daughter’s decision to study abroad, only to discover that she has other plans.
This remake of the classic Grimm tale follows fair-skinned Snow White on a quest to regain her royal throne with help from a team of shady dwarves.
A modern love story is connected to an ancient folk tale as star-crossed lovers from different social classes are kept apart by their families.
On a summer night in 1890 Ireland, the unsettled daughter of aristocrats coaxes her father's valet to seduce her, though he's engaged to their cook.
With their divorce set to become final on Christmas day, a couple must decide if they're really ready to throw in the towel on their relationship.
Resolving to get married soon, hardworking Si-yi finds love in an unexpected place, but her ex and her job interfere with her plans.
This uplifting documentary follows R&B singer Sharon Jones's battle with pancreatic cancer while keeping her band intact for a return to the stage.

norm_title: mission control the unsung heroes of apollo
description: Combining archive footage with present-day interviews, this documentary explores how Apollo's mission control helped change the course of history.
As Hitler's Nazis threaten to take command of Britain's skies, a squadron of Polish pilots arrives to aid the Royal Air Force against a mutual enemy.
Two strangers meet by chance on a trip to Thailand and form a connection when they realize their former romantic partners ended up getting together.
A gambler mired in debt thinks another cardsharp may just be his good luck charm as the two head for New Orleans to buy into a high-stakes poker game.
After investing in a shady deal that quickly falls apart, a morally flexible real estate agent involves his wife in a dangerous recovery plan.
During the War of 1812, two Native Americans and their British ally are pursued into enemy territory by American soldiers thirsting for revenge.
A lethal game of cat and mouse stretches from the desert to Tinseltown after Hollywood bad boy Thomas runs afoul of a cunning and dangerous drifter.
A young boy's life shifts when he's sent to work at a mechanic's shop far from his suburban home until an opportunity forces him to make a tough choice.
Former Olympian Molly Bloom ran a high-stakes poker game for the stars – until her lofty lifestyle nearly sent her to prison.
An aspiring hair stylist opens her own salon. It turns into a mail-holding hub for busy neighbors, but she seizes the chance to promote her business.
In 1953, the women of Wellesley College are measured by how well they marry – until the arrival of a professor who threatens to upend the status quo.
Two corporate spies with a $5 million haul for selling secrets are held hostage by a thief, triggering a game of cat and mouse to gain the upper hand.
TV news reporter James Russell helps put small-time criminal Franklin Hatchett in jail, but turns to protecting Hatchett when he escapes from prison.
Join zoologist Dr. George McGavin for a fascinating, up-close look at the habits and behaviors of primates, our closest animal relatives.
A talking monkey famous for his TV commercials dreams of breaking into real movies. But first he stumbles upon a brother and sister who need his help.
Seeking revenge on his employer, a lazy bank agent and his two dim-witted friends concoct an elaborate but flawed heist.
An office temp thinks she's found Mr. Right when she starts dating a handsome surgeon. But there's a problem standing in the way of everlasting bliss.
TV personality Monty Don visits France’s most famous gardens to dig up the influence of power, culture and passion on their conceptions and designs.
From horticultural hideaways to luxurious botanical displays, TV personality Monty Don explores the history behind Italy’s most extraordinary gardens.
As he nears the end of a lonely three-year stint on the moon base Sarang, astronaut Sam Bell begins to hear and see strange things.
In a crime-infested Miami neighborhood, a gay African-American boy with a drug-addicted mother grows up with the help of a mentoring drug dealer.
A brain-addled war vet, a failing band manager and a Stanley Kubrick impersonator help the CIA construct an epic scam by faking the 1969 moon landing.
A railway stationmaster tries to cope with his wife's death, his estrangement from his son and the corrupt world in which he lives.
When his father moves from the U.S. to Heidelberg, Germany, an African American teenager struggles to find his place and pursue his hip-hop dreams.
This comic documentary follows the Mortified movement, a series of stage events where adults share awkward childhood moments in front of strangers.
Two communities in Mumbai get a final chance to compete with each other in the celebration of the iconic Ganesh Chaturthi festival.
Featuring breathtaking imagery and thought-provoking narration, this film takes viewers to the summits of some of the world’s most amazing mountains.
An eye-popping cast stars in this sketch-comedy collage, the new millennium's homage to classic anthology films like The Kentucky Fried Movie.
A temporary personal chef, a terminally ill single mother and her young daughter form an unlikely bond that redefines the meaning of family.
After inheriting a media empire, humble Longfellow Deeds moves to the Big Apple – where a reporter and a company bigwig are waiting to pounce on him.

norm_title: mr gaga a true story of love and dance
description: World-renowned choreographer Ohad Naharin is profiled in this vivid documentary that mixes rehearsal footage with insights about his influence.
When a young man ignores a feng shui master’s warning and decides to marry before turning 30, a series of mishaps begins to curse his life.
When a self-help author learns that his mother has fallen for his sadistic high school gym teacher, he tries to put a stop to their budding romance.
After Adam graduates from college at age 14, he heads back to high school to teach science, where his crush and his best friends are his students!
A successful advertising agency executive falls asleep on an airplane and wakes up in an alternate universe as a stay-at-home mom with three kids.
Two Mississippi teens meet peculiar drifter Mud and get caught up in his web of tall tales about lost love, crimes of passion and bounty hunters.
Samir must overcome a hostile horoscope, a hot temper and a determined rival to win the heart of Rani, the love of his life.
In the middle of their global tour, the Muppets inadvertently get mixed up in a perilous drama involving a gang of international jewel thieves.
Mixing interviews with dramatic re-enactments, this series focuses on lethal love affairs and spouses driven to murder.
After a natural disaster known as the Big Fart leaves Earth divided, only Sheriff and his rebel misfits can protect the planet from a mutant invasion.
Marlon Brando gives a nuanced performance as the aristocratic Lt. Fletcher Christian, an officer aboard the HMS Bounty who leads a mutiny against the ship's tyrannical Capt. Bligh.

norm_title: my babysitters a vampire the movie
description: When their parents head out for the evening, Ethan and his little sister get the babysitter of their nightmares: a fledgling vampire named Sarah.
After being diagnosed HIV-positive, a champion swimmer is disowned and harassed by all except his loving sister and loyal boyfriend.
After the sudden loss of her husband, a mother has a crisis of faith and struggles to keep her life together for the sake of her daughter and herself.
Relocated to a new post and struggling to adjust, a police officer further complicates his life by falling for a woman he has little in common with.

norm_title: my entire high school sinking into the sea
description: After an earthquake sends their school building drifting into the sea, a group of high-schoolers struggles to survive and overcome clique wars.
A recently dumped attorney hires a psychic to help her win back her boyfriend. Things take an unexpected turn when another ex re-enters the picture.
A 9-year-old boy finds his life upended when he's sent to live in an orphanage in this stop-motion animated tale of loss, friendship and young love.

norm_title: my little pony equestria girls friendship games
description: Rainbow Dash, Applejack and friends compete against Crystal Prep Academy and their lead athlete, this world's Twilight Sparkle, in sporting events.

norm_title: my little pony equestria girls rainbow rocks
description: Rainbow Dash, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Rarity and Fluttershy plan to perform with their new band at the Canterlot High musical showcase.
After the untimely demise of her first three husbands, a stoic single mom is left to raise twelve children on her own and provide for her big family.
A brainy private school student is transferred to a far less elite institution, where he must fend off classmates who settle scores with fistfights.
After speaking with former Scientology members and being stonewalled by higher-ups, filmmaker Louis Theroux hires actors to re-create alleged events.
A former defense attorney finds herself back in court when she and her husband are sued for medical emancipation by their 11-year-old daughter.
Ink junkies dig skin deep and share personal stories about their collection of body art.
A bullied student forms a bond with the leader of a youth gang and discovers the power and meaning of true friendship.
While filming a movie in England, Hollywood icon Marilyn Monroe slips away with a young Brit for a week of self-discovery and frivolity.
A man finds his marriage to a dedicated women's rights activist facing some unexpected challenges over her commitment to the cause.
Hosts Joel and Mike and their robot companions offer hilarious running commentary on B movies they're forced to watch in these classic MST3K episodes.
After losing her father, a young woman moves to the city to earn money. When she finds a job at a mysterious bungalow, her worst nightmares come true.
When Ignacio learns of an orphanage's financial woes, he pitches in to help – by disguising himself and joining the professional wrestling circuit.
This documentary examines the naked yoga gurus of India whose devout spiritual practice connects them to the eternal, transcending the material world.
Recently paralyzed in a devastating car accident, Dana begins to suspect a dark and sinister force may be lurking within her hospital room.
Scientists and animal keepers fight to save an orphaned baby elephant at a rescue camp in Botswana while struggling to defend its entire species.
While loyally defending his boss from mobsters trying to kill him, a naive, hotel bellboy discovers the family he never knew he had.
Mistakenly accused of an attack on the Fourth Raikage, ninja Naruto is imprisoned in the impenetrable Hozuki Castle and his powers are sealed.
Three former military operatives offer disturbing, firsthand accounts of the deadly impact that U.S. drone warfare has had on civilians overseas.

In this parody of the Lethal Weapon franchise, criminals murder a detective and steal her prized evidence: microfilm with a recipe for cocaine cookies. Luckily, loose-cannon cop Jack Colt and his by-the-book partner, Wes Luger, are on the case.
Narrated by Robert Redford, this documentary tours the awe-inspiring landscapes, historic sites and untamed wilderness of America's great parks.
Modern treasure hunters search for a chest of riches rumored to have been stashed away by George Washington, Thomas Jefferson and Benjamin Franklin.
A veteran Shakespearean actor steps off the stage and into the painful tragedy of old age, facing ungrateful family and his fleeting legacy.
The biggest pranksters on YouTube – VitalyzdTV, Dennis Roady and Roman Atwood – turn Hollywood into "Prankwood" with their most over-the-top stunts.
As the new kid, a shy high school senior finds himself tormented by all his peers except one. But his new friend has a dark, infectious outlook.
With custom-built cameras attached to their bodies, animals from nine species offer a rare and intimate glimpse into their lives.
Sometimes being shady is the only way to survive, a fact these sneaky animal "hustlers" – including orcas, owls and otters – use to their advantage.
Sir David Attenborough examines a recently discovered collection of dinosaur fossils. CGI and 3-D scans reveal what the beast may have looked like.
This series looks at how seasonal changes cause shifting weather patterns and ocean currents, creating the conditions for spectacular wildlife events.
Look behind the scenes of this wildlife documentary series that examines how animals around the world adapt to chaotic natural phenomena.
Epic footage captures three of the world's most significant land migrations, following elephants, caribou and zebras on their treacherous journeys.
Host Chris Packham examines bizarre natural phenomena from around the globe, from strange creatures to geographical oddities.
Shocking footage shows Nazi concentration camps after liberation, including Buchenwald and Ohrdruf, where Gen. Eisenhower ordered local Nazis to tour.
This documentary series examines Nazi Germany's military hardware, defenses and technology, including fortifications, U-boats and ballistic missiles.
When a Chilean policeman vows to find and capture leftist poet Pablo Neruda, a game of cat and mouse ensues that tests both their wills.
As his father sits behind bars, a young man is lured into Los Angeles' merciless drug world and forced to choose between God and gang life.
When bickering teenage twins accidentally land in the middle of a criminal operation, they'll have to work together to get themselves out of trouble.
Las Vegas magician Cris can see a few minutes into the future and an FBI agent wants his help thwarting a nuclear attack.
With numbers written on a doll as their only clue, three officers of the law track down a psychotic killer, unearthing dark secrets along the way.
A teen fresh out of juvenile detention tries to rescue her sister from foster care in order to exact revenge on their father for their mother's murder.
A pair of young environmentalists enlist the help of an ex-military explosives expert to carry out a dangerous act of eco-terrorism.
A young hustler finds success trolling the streets of Los Angeles to film disasters and death. But the darkness he captures starts to take hold of him.
When a hurricane hits a coastal North Carolina inn and strands the only guest, surgeon Paul Flanner, a young woman's life changes forever.
Everyone's favorite teenage mutants are back in live action to fight crime with help from a new ninja turtle – a female named Venus De Milo.
After a prank goes sideways, three buddies find their relationships  – with women and each other – tested in unexpected ways.
A woman enters a quirky mental health clinic after attempting suicide upon finding out her husband is having an affair with her best friend.
Kate, an uptight chef, finds her life turned upside down when her sister dies in a car accident and she becomes her niece's sole guardian.
A series of incidents in Afghanistan set complicated political and personal events in motion for a returning Norwegian Special Forces officer.

norm_title: norm of the north king sized adventure
description: Before planning an awesome wedding for his grandfather, a polar bear king must take back a stolen artifact from an evil archaeologist first.
An 18-year-old struggling to understand her best friend's suicide talks to teenagers who have grappled with mental illness and suicidal thoughts.
Scientists test avian aptitude and challenge concepts of intelligence with examples ranging from puzzle-solving crows to parrots with a sense of time.
Astrophysicists show how black holes might hold answers to how the universe evolved, leading to life on Earth and, ultimately, the human race.
Thirty years after Chernobyl’s nuclear disaster, engineers race against time to complete a new dome to contain the reactor’s lethal radiation.
The chariot dominated Chinese warfare for millennia. Now, a team of experts is building their own and unlocking its many secrets.
Drilling into the impact crater of the asteroid that wiped out the dinosaurs, a group of scientists unearths new evidence about the catastrophic event.

Scientists investigate Earth’s climate machine, looking for clues across the globe, from Greenland’s ice sheet to the desert of Australia.
Scientists reveal how the 2017 solar eclipse provided new clues into how the sun works, from its scorching atmosphere to its deadly solar storms.

During risky expeditions in an underwater cave, scientists unearth a 13,000-year-old skeleton to gain insight into the earliest known humans in America.
At a former Nazi execution site in Lithuania, an international team of archaeologists searches for a lost escape tunnel dug by Jewish prisoners.
Scientists search for evidence left behind by the world’s greatest floods and predict if climate change will cause even greater aquatic disasters.
Scientists research the world’s deadliest hurricane, trying to understand what this 18th-century storm could tell us about our own future.
Evidence of a mysterious medieval famine leads researchers on a quest for one of the deadliest volcanoes in human history.
With the science of forecasting flourishing, this documentary explores how predictions inform our lives and statistics and algorithms' reliability.

norm_title: nova secrets of the shining knight
description: A master armorer and his team recreate parts of a knight's medieval armor and test its strength while rediscovering centuries-old metalworking secrets.
An international team of rescue workers race to save 12 young soccer players and their coach trapped in a flooded cave in Thailand.
Two adventurous pilots attempt to fly around the world without using any fuel, relying only on the power of the sun.
Dissatisfied with the police’s progress, a teen and his best friend investigate their classmate's murder, treading down a dark path to the uneasy truth.
Waxing nostalgic about the bittersweet passage from childhood to puberty, four childhood girlfriends recall the magical summer of 1970.

norm_title: now more than ever the history of chicago
description: This rockumentary tells the behind-the-scenes story of the Hall-of-Fame band Chicago, from their jazz-rock fusion roots to chart-topping pop hits.
Raised by his aunt since he was a young boy, charismatic John Lennon is suddenly reunited with his mother, Julia, which ignites a bitter battle.
After German reunification, the neo-Nazi National Socialist Underground begins a killing spree while cops fight an uphill battle to catch them.
This documentary series lifts the mask on Mexican wrestling, diving into the daily lives of its stars, examining the sport’s cultural impact and more.
Guided by survivors' testimonies, this documentary explores the history and meaning of the numbers tattooed on the bodies of Auschwitz prisoners.

norm_title: numero zero the roots of italian rap
description: In the '90s, the explosive popularity of hip-hop music in Italy impacts the nation's character while creating a new kind of renegade artist.
A flawed but dedicated ER nurse works in a New York City hospital and relies on pain meds to get through exhausting days in this Emmy-winning show.
Top medical, criminal and psychological experts analyze the motives and methods of nurses who use their positions to kill rather than heal.
The second half of Lars von Trier's epic follows Joe as her reignited sex addiction destroys her family and thrusts her toward a surprising new trade.
Five schoolmates who share a blood type navigate the vagaries of friendship, love and university life.
This film details the rise of British rock group Oasis and the creativity and chaos that brothers Noel and Liam Gallagher brought to the iconic band.
After being fired from her job and dumped by her cheating boyfriend, a comedian has a one-night stand. Weeks later, she finds out she's pregnant.
This documentary examines the vital role water plays in human existence and the cause-and-effect interplay between oceans and the environment.
When aliens take over their small Australian town, a modest group of survivors must unite to fend off their otherworldly intruders.
Frank Sinatra leads an all-star cast as Danny Ocean, who decides to knock over a few casinos on the Las Vegas Strip with his buddies.
This entry in the all-star caper franchise finds debonair con man Danny Ocean and his gang taking revenge on a double-crossing Las Vegas kingpin.
Danny Ocean reunites with his old flame and the rest of his merry band of thieves in a caper covering three huge heists in Rome, Paris and Amsterdam.
An undercover detective crosses paths with familiar faces in the mafia underworld during the final years of Britain's ruling of Hong Kong.
Fed up with the uselessness of their degrees and swayed by a TV commercial, two Spaniards head to Berlin for work but find it not quite as advertised.
Fallen Los Angeles police officer Terrence Downe finds new life as a secret weapon: a scientifically altered super-cop with unlimited lives.
The spirited trio are back to take on a new ghost-busting adventure at a mens' residence, where spooky secrets lurk around every corner.
After a body is discovered in their building, a vengeful, paranormal presence begins to affect Taew, Mod Dum and Cartoon's business.
Ghosts wreak havoc at the old school, and a student communicates with the spirit while the team reckons with a power struggle.
Domestic terrorist Timothy McVeigh's bomb attack on an Oklahoma City federal building in 1995 is chronicled in this examination of the shocking event.

norm_title: oliver stones untold history of the united states
description: This documentary series offers an alternative take on modern American history, focusing on underreported events that shaped the nation's character.
In this second sequel of the trilogy, marital strife brews as Omar pursues a music career despite Salma’s wishes that he opt for a more stable job.
Two rebellious, hot-headed teenage brothers get caught up in gang life, which has dangerous repercussions for their family and friends.

norm_title: on yoga the architecture of peace
description: Based on photographer Michael O’Neill’s book of the same name, this documentary traces the author’s 10-year journey through the landscape of yoga.
Seeking to heal after a traumatic assault, a young woman retreats to a small village by the hills, where she finds hope, love and new purpose.

norm_title: once in a lifetime sessions with moby
description: Through performances and interviews, musician Moby opens up about his unusual childhood, his heroes and the stories behind his songs.

norm_title: once in a lifetime sessions with nile rodgers
description: The career of rhythm guitarist and Chic founder Nile Rodgers is chronicled in this musical blend of documentary and original concert performance.

norm_title: once in a lifetime sessions with noel gallagher
description: Between scenes from an intimate performance, the Oasis legend reflects on his road to stardom and offers insights on his creative process.

norm_title: once in a lifetime sessions with tlc
description: One of the most successful female groups in music history, TLC performs in concert while taking a look back at their tumultuous history.

norm_title: once upon a time in london
description: Organized crime came to London in the 1930s, ushering in three decades ruled by two legendary gangsters whose legacy outlived their reign.

norm_title: once upon a time in the west
description: In this epic spaghetti Western, a flinty gunslinger is hired by a railroad tycoon to kill anyone standing in the way of his trans-American iron horse.
When his colleague (and crush) temporarily loses her memory, an overlooked geek seizes the chance to make an impression before she remembers again.
Award-winning documentarian Morgan Spurlock turns his camera on boy band phenomenon One Direction in this combination concert film and backstage pass.

norm_title: one heart the ar rahman concert film
description: In this concert film, Indian musical maestro A.R. Rahman performs 15 of his most popular songs and reveals himself through interviews and clips.
After 25 years of searching, a lonely dentist finds his long-lost daughter but learns that she suffers from a rare medical condition.
Infertility affects millions. One couple copes with the assisted reproduction process by documenting its pain, disappointment and potential joy.
An obsession with a woman with whom he had a one-night stand brings disharmony into a man's life and destroys his peace of mind.
Hosted by Will Smith, this series follows eight astronauts who share their unique perspectives on Earth, the fragile and beautiful planet we call home.
When a cop kills the brother of an expat American gangster who runs a Bangkok fight club, his crime-boss mother flies in to supervise revenge.
Given unprecedented access to soldiers and terrorists alike, journalist Michael Ware presents an epic, uncensored, intimate account of the Iraq War.
After saving a deer from a hunter's clutches, a domesticated grizzly finds himself relocated to the wild – and unprepared for the real world.
In a dangerous area of the Mekong River, a drug raid ending in 13 deaths arouses the suspicions of a narcotics officer who sets out to find the truth.
A Russian mobster, a Cuban spy and a smooth operator from Miami scheme to sell a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million.
Drs. Chris and Xand van Tulleken take an entertaining approach to educate children about medicine and biology through experiments and hospital visits.
On Yi-seul's wedding day, her friend Baek-ho wishes he could turn back time to tell her he loves her. Soon he gets a chance to change everything.
A special task force takes on a risky operation to evacuate civilians amid civil war. Based on the 2015 mission to rescue Chinese citizens in Yemen.
When a programmer uses his wife's sympathetic voice for his company's customer service app, he starts to rely more on her idealized self than her.

norm_title: opium and the kung fu master
description: Leader of the Ten Kwangtung Tigers, Tieh Chiao-san works with his kung fu students to protect his village from crime. But when an opium dealer starts to ruin the town, Tieh Chiao-san struggles to fight back, thanks to his growing opium addiction.
This documentary series explores the stories behind history's most fascinating innovations, including games, technology, sports, medicine and more.
When the village's biryani cook unexpectedly passes, a widow steps up to the plate and takes on new delectable challenges.
After inventing a drug that induces time-compressed virtual realities, young Ren grapples with partner Sam over how to use their powerful creation.
Young orphan Kuttappayi goes to live with his grandfather in the country, but his new life takes a hard turn when his grandfather's health fails.
In 1986, Tommaso Buscetta became the first top-level Mafia boss ever to testify against the mob. It cost him and his family everything.
A young man invents a device he hopes will generate wireless energy, but instead, it proves to spark sinister, supernatural activity in his home.
In a battle of the bands, a percussions student and her musical kindred spirits set out to prove the merits of Chinese folk against the Western canon.
After a failed mission, an ex-Royal Marines Commando tries to overcome his demons while investigating the death of his ex-girlfriend's father.
An orphan girl taught magic by her sick grandma must find work in seedy Bangkok, where unsavory characters run afoul of her increasingly dark powers.
A prostitute who is down on her luck gets caught in the middle of an elaborate scheme orchestrated by two local politicians.
P. King, the daring but hapless duck, teams up with best buddies Wombat and Chumpkins to find wacky and wild ways to solve their problems.
When she loses her beloved husband to a brain tumor, grieving widow Holly Kennedy learns that he left a series of letters behind to help her cope.
A face painter for Theyyam rituals who is himself disfigured conceals his guilt over the fact that he performs abortions as a medical practitioner.
In this animated satire, a covert squad of operatives short on smarts but long on confidence tackles crime on the glitzy Gold Coast of Australia.
When profit-seekers threaten to take over a bar in a tourist town, local martial artists put their skills to the test and fight back.
This fictionalized account of three real-life notorious Harlem drug dealers is told in flashbacks as they plunge into the world of hustling.
In the wake of a young artist’s suicide, his pianist mother and his despairing girlfriend square off in a living nightmare beset by guilt and blame.
In this dramatized rendition, students undergo rigorous study at Master Yu's Peking Opera school, a cradle for future Hong Kong film stars.
In this documentary, a centuries-old horse race in the city of Siena, Italy, is the forum for a showdown between a young jockey and his former mentor.
Finding a tantalizing clue in an old letter, a young woman journeys to her family's tropical plantation to uncover generations of secrets.
A woman and her daughter are caught in a game of cat-and-mouse with burglars in their New York City home and are forced to retreat inside a vault.
After witnessing a murder, a meek family man must summon his courage when he finds himself on the wrong side of a notorious gangster.
A young newlywed tries to keep her relationship afloat after developing feelings for her older, TV writer boss.
When Katie and Micah fear their home may be haunted by a demonic presence, Micah sets up a video camera to document all the action.
In interviews and reenactments, ordinary people relive their terrifying encounters with unwelcome guests from beyond the world of the living.
Prompted by loyalty, Arjun plays matchmaker between his philandering foster brother and a conservative girl but winds up falling in love himself.
As the parents of three unmarried daughters, a humble cook and his wife contend with the challenges of matchmaking and social expectations.
This Sundance prize-winning documentary is an intimate portrait of 1980s Harlem drag balls: a world of fierce competition, sustenance, and survival.
In this Emmy-nominated comedy, an employee with a rural Parks and Recreation department is full of energy and ideas but bogged down by bureaucracy.
Three brothers seek to avenge the tragic death of a loved one, but become emotionally entangled with the daughters of those they hold responsible.
Air marshal John Cutter must stop notorious terrorist Charles Rane from killing hostages on board a flight that should have delivered Rane to jail.
A talented young Indian cricket player must defy his father's wishes to play for the side of England, a rebellion his siblings quietly cheer.
A surgeon claims to remove high tech microchips that aliens used to manipulate the human race. This documentary seeks to separate fact from fiction.
CIA desk jockey Jack Ryan plunges into the heart of international terrorism after spoiling an assassination attempt on a British royal family member.
